comments: 10%... 3 hours later. Still 20% Now every single thing is a money making scam. I used to enjoy this but my liking has gradually decreased... The 6 islands used to be able to be explored leisurely... No. I Don't Want More. "Hire A Worker" "You Dont Have Enough Food!!!" NEED MORE SHOVELS!! Cannot Leave Islands. Have To Piss Away Cash Money On Gems To RETURN... MORE COIN PILES WOULD SURE BE NICE

It's a nice game that gets you hooked really quickly. But as for the gameplay, all you can do is make your workers do tasks and then come back some hours later when they're finished. The expeditions are nice, most of all the graphics and the love to detail. Still it's impossible to fibish the expeditions in time unless you don't have no others hobbies. *smirk* But all in all it's fine! <3

It is amazing.really keeps you hooked on.. However when it comes to completing the quest, resources get over quickly and as per the time we need to wait for 3hrs for getting the refill,or buy it with the diamonds.... Lower the time limit for resource production like in different expeditions..as that will unable us to play more and complete it too on time.

Game is addictive . Would give 5 stars if you add more workers to start with.  Need to make it way less time to make supplies . Make quests less things to complete them . Instead of 4 to 5 apples or whatever should only be 1 . Great game but people will stop playing if you don't stop making it so expensive to play.  Not every one has real money to spend they way you make them to play.  When you run out of apples you charge 10 diamond's to refill the next time is 20 and then 40 come on . Please make this more player friendly.  There are games out there who care about the players and not the money . Please be one of them . Then I will give 5 stars

I thought it would be more about solving things, but there are no brain challenges for now and I'm on the 10th level. I've noticed that a few times some of my coins disappeared. Slow as you need to grow a lot of food etc. before you can do anything. You would have to spend quite a lot of real money to make it reasonable pace

Just wish coins would add up over time. You have to keep getting them as soon as they are available. Don't like having to it for an hour just to be able to do something in the game and then there is nothing to do but collect the coins every couple of minutes a few at a time. But this is a great ongoing game except for that.

descriptionHTML:
Tiered of far too same games, stories and experiences? Looking for something thrilling and unique? You’ve found it!

Welcome to The Island – place where there’s no time to be bored. Where two lost kids urgently need your help to survive. Where numerous hidden treasures are waiting for you to hunt for them. Where ancient Archipelagos pop up from nowhere to be explored. Where hundreds of quests, missions and puzzles makes you feel challenged every day. You’ll dig it.

But remember! – The Island has The Secret.

Island Experiment features:

♥ Help two lost kids survive on The Island
♥ Turn an abandoned beach into a flourishing farm
♥ Grow food, craft equipment, build a seaside city
♥ Explore the Island and its Heartland
♥ Hunt for hidden treasures
♥ Travel to ancient Archipelagos
♥ Reveal a mystery of a Pyramid
♥ Complete thrilling quests & challenging missions
♥ Gain unique rewards
♥ Collect lovable local pets
♥ Play with your friends and make new ones
And… have fun!

The game is free to play and addictive. Be careful!

https://islandexperiment.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

comments: I used to love this game. But now all it has become is an ATM for the developer. Every good car in the game must be bought. Winning special events costs money. In game rewards have become useless. There are plenty of other racing games out there that won't require you to refinance your house to play. If I could give it zero stars I would.

Sound could use tweaking, I've driven some of the t1 and t2 cars and they do not sound like that. The grind is real in this game but the developer adds events on a frequent basis to over shadow this. Which would be great if the events didn't expect you to either have the devils luck with silver key crates or a never ending supply of cash.   Over all, great game. I still enjoy playing it even when I hit a "pay wall" and that says something about the game. I've only put $5 into this game (bought a $4.99 special pack) and I've still made it pretty far.

This is by far the greatest racing game I've played on a mobile device! The graphics are amazing, the controls are solid, and it keeps me coming back for more. The only issue I've found with it so far is the live races. Its sometimes hard to find a race and the races themselves seem unfair at times. Other than that, its a great game! Highly recommended!

Other than a gas glitch, I play this all the time. Takes some time to get the right parts for your cars. So if you can just race and collect money until you get a car with all 6 red parts, it's quick entertainment. You have to buy "super nitrous" to beat the leader in a race for his car...which sucks. There should be someway to get super nitrous in the game without buying with real money.

Awesome game and graphics, but pretty much have to spend money if you wanna compete. Should have more races available a t all times. Need to make ALL cars accessible to purchase, with preferably money earned in the game and not $20 of real money or depend on luck to get a good car in "rare imports". Especially, when available races are so limited, supply races, etc., unless you're satisfied with just regulation races.

The game is good, but the "race a boss for their car" is definitely a con. You beat them with ease, then re-race for their car and suddenly they can run like 3 seconds quicker? Do me a favour...  It would be better if after each race you went back to the map rather than the garage. Going back to the garage is seriously annoying.  It would be good if we could have some sort of crew v crew event. Say, 10 racers from each crew pick a car and set a time. Then you get matched up with an opponent and you have to beat their times. Then it's most overall wins or something for crew points?
description: CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGONSetting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!REAL-TIME RACING• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.CAR CUSTOMISATION• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.• Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE• Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.• CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world’s most desirable car manufacturers including:• Ferrari• McLaren• Bugatti• Lamborghini• Pagani• KoenigseggCHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD• Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.• Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.• Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.DOMINATE THE CITY• Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.• Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?• Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. New events added daily!---------------------Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.PLEASE NOTE! Must be 13+ to play. CSR Racing 2 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.To prevent unauthorized purchases, select “Set or Change PIN” from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the “Use PIN for Purchases” option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy
descriptionHTML:
CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!

“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU
“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC
“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGON

Setting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.

Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!

3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS
• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.
• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!

REAL-TIME RACING
• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.

CAR CUSTOMISATION
• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.
• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!

UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE
• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.
• Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.

BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE
• Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.
• CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world’s most desirable car manufacturers including:
• Ferrari
• McLaren
• Bugatti
• Lamborghini
• Pagani
• Koenigsegg

CHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD
• Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.
• Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.
• Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.

DOMINATE THE CITY
• Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.
• Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?
• Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. New events added daily!


---------------------

Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE! Must be 13+ to play. CSR Racing 2 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.

To prevent unauthorized purchases, select “Set or Change PIN” from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the “Use PIN for Purchases” option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy
developerAddress:
6 Agar Street
London WC2N 4HN

In partnership with Lamborghini, CSR2 brings you a double world exclusive from the 2018 Geneva Motorshow! The Lamborghini Urus and the Huracán Performante Spyder.
ASTON MARTIN VANTAGE & LIBERTY WALK AUDI R8 V10:
CSR2 is thrilled to bring you the new sleek Aston Martin Vantage and the aggressively styled Liberty Walk Audi R8 V10.
summary: Race your way to the top of the leaderboards in your custom supercar with CSR2!
title: CSR Racing 2

comments: Blatant ripoff of the Godfather:Family Dynasty. The gameplay, interface is exactly the same. Don't know if the devs of FD know about this. It's also very childish and unoriginal, you don't get a serious feel when playing.. the ONLY plus is the graphics are good. But looks aren't everything

I have to give this a 1 star for everything lol. This game has broken more copyright laws than any other mobile game I've ever played. The ads were completely false with other large title games gameplay. The game had the dignity to use a GTA V start up screen without crediting proper sources.

Still early, things take longer to get done if you don't spend real time money, but it's entertaining, really dislike the prompts to like on facebook.  Nobody cares what my score is and I'm sure I'd lose friends if I filled their feed with gaming info.  Game is slow but fun.

I just lost 49.99 on a recharge, and current event is glitching my score to 0! I sent screenshots thru line app @ mafiacitycs no one responded. This review will improve when my situation does. I've already spent Almost $200 and you guys are gonna lose my business. UPDATE: I've been in chat with customer service. I sent screenshots, and they say I've received gold. I currently have 2 gold so...Gonna say they're wrong I sent them screenshots and they are NOT fixing. I will change this comment when someone fix's my issue. This IS a great game. Doesn't mean I'm throwing away 49.99
Froze every time after had been playing for a few days, always at the same point. Reinstalled, same problem. Liked the game for the couple days I was able to play. Customer service was not helpful

Just another linear empire builder with an exponential grind curve. Some pretty graphics, but overall juvenile presentation and writing. Popups constantly accost you for purchases or Facebook invites, and flashing icons all around the screen serve to distract and annoy more often than informing of useful actions. Only a single attack order at a time means very limited "gameplay" when interacting with other players. The first 24 hours may go quickly, but progression hits a (pay) wall immediately after that.

comments: This is  a extremely exciting game to play. It reminds me of the game PITFALL from ATARII. All though I like the graphics and the obstacles, I wish you could save your progress.

I think this  game is so interesting  that I play it all day , and somtimes  it tell you that you  should  never ever  steal any thing  from a dangerous  place where nobody  is there, it is really  difficult.  Good luck  and be  safe
It's a great game to spend time playing on but I would like the controls to change, their to annoying when I jump I die and am like WOAH... I JUMPED, THOUGH!!! otherwise. Great game.

All your friends are playing it - can you beat their high scores?!You've stolen the cursed idol from the temple, and now you have to run for your life to escape the Evil Demon Monkeys nipping at your heels. comments: Once you get to the higher levels, it gets really expensive, and each game costs coins. Sometimes it takes up to 10 tries to pass a level. There should be another way to earn coins. Beautiful game, love to play, just too expensive, and any bought coins don't last long cause losing is so costly. Too bad because it's a fun game.  Could you please tell me what the incentive is to continue? Even when you make more money with more crops, it then costs more money to play.   I don't imagine you'll respond, but I hope so.

Love the game but I think the bonus levels to unlock gold crops should be heaps cheaper to play. Some of them are hard and you run out of money to keep trying them as they cost as much as a normal level to play.

It looks good and the gameplay is fun. Unfortunately that fun only lasts so long before the game devolves into micro transaction hell. Each round gets so expensive that I can only play one or two unless I were to buy coin packs. These guys should be ashamed.

I'm in the 60's level and find it very difficult to accumulate sufficient points to maintain play for longer than two or three games and that is after accumulating a days worth of "harvest now" points which requires your interaction every hour at this level and no play. You have to win at least a couple games without using the free points to purchase additional cards or wild cards, opening up as many cards as possible for as many options and longer streaks, and playing some of the "cheaper (points wise)" and easier glade challenges. Winning a games without additional cards barely gets you above where you started and any add'l cards drain you quickly even if you win to the point that you lose all and you have to accumulate another day of points for another 15 minutes of play.  Bonuses are just too slow in coming and wins just don't count for much. I love the peaceful backgrounds and graphics though.

I liked this  game, but each game cost to much to play and you go through credit to fast.  $500 a game, then it goes up pretty fast to $1000 a game, then to $1500 a game, etc... plus reply as wild cards cost a lot.  There are other solitaire   games that are less frustrating  I  would rather play.
I CANT STOP PLAYING, LOSING SLEEP. WAITING FOR THE NEXT NEW LEVELS. DON'T STOP CREATING.

Don't want to play hours of boring levels to get to (hopefully) more difficult stuff. I would have no issue if the levels were at least different from each other. It takes merely 10 seconds to get through the starting levels but there are just too many. It's wasteful.

Good for burning time. Fun puzzler. The ads are atrocious; I understand wanting to get something out of your creation, but I'm burning through levels so quickly it seems like ads are every few seconds. The game isn't exciting enough for me to buy ad-free. They're pop up ads, which are the worst kind for accidental clicking.

It's ok some are easy but they do get harder. I like the game. I don't play it all the time. I am a bit annoyed about the ads. They pop up now and then when I don't want them to. description: A brain-training puzzle in which you draw 1 line, that will sharpen your wits.In this free-to-play puzzle game, you merely have to draw one line. It is deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep.Play through the extensive stages, sharpening your wits as you have fun.SummaryA brain-training puzzle game that activates your mind as you play.When you've got a spare moment, on your daily commute, or before going to bed, why not experience what it feels like to activate you mind?How to playThere is only one rule:"Connect all the points with just one line."It doesn't matter where you start.There are some fiendishly tricky, complicated puzzles among the large number of stages.When you get stuck, make use of a hint.StagesThere are 10 levels, and a total of 500 stages.At first, it starts off with simple shapes, but each time your level increases, the number of lines increases, and it gets more and more complicated.You might think it's too easy early on.However, clearing the simple stages is also important.The hints to clearing the later, more complicated stages can all be found scattered through the simple stages.Some unique types of line, such as "one way lines" and "overlapping lines", can also be found throughout the stages.These special lines will encourage your imagination.Use this chance to activate your mind as you play, by trying to solve this free-to-play brain-training puzzle game.You're sure to get hooked!!
descriptionHTML:
A brain-training puzzle in which you draw 1 line, that will sharpen your wits.
In this free-to-play puzzle game, you merely have to draw one line. It is deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep.
Play through the extensive stages, sharpening your wits as you have fun.

Summary
A brain-training puzzle game that activates your mind as you play.
When you've got a spare moment, on your daily commute, or before going to bed, why not experience what it feels like to activate you mind?

How to play
There is only one rule:
"Connect all the points with just one line."
It doesn't matter where you start.

There are some fiendishly tricky, complicated puzzles among the large number of stages.
When you get stuck, make use of a hint.

Stages
There are 10 levels, and a total of 500 stages.
At first, it starts off with simple shapes, but each time your level increases, the number of lines increases, and it gets more and more complicated.
You might think it's too easy early on.
However, clearing the simple stages is also important.
The hints to clearing the later, more complicated stages can all be found scattered through the simple stages.

Some unique types of line, such as "one way lines" and "overlapping lines", can also be found throughout the stages.
These special lines will encourage your imagination.

Use this chance to activate your mind as you play, by trying to solve this free-to-play brain-training puzzle game.
You're sure to get hooked!!

comments: This is a very fun game. It got me hooked for hours. However, there are still some things that need improvement. For example, when walking sideways along fences you can get over them. This is an issue as once i did this and fell into the water not being able to get back on. Also, the spikes do not seem to have an effect on the shark so they are useless. I do believe that the developer needs to continue to work on this game and introduce new items and uses for them.

It's honestly a pretty good game, it's fun, even though there's no real end goal and a lack of side quests. Although many improvements can be made to the game, the worst part is the ads, it's really bad, and it's insulting as a player that they try to milk this much out of us. You have constant random ads that take over your game at any moment. 5 ads per chest you craft to unlock each slot, ads when you switch to the map, floating treasure chests that require ads to open, even more pointless ads at every crafting bench, and the list goes on. I would gladly even pay to play an ad free version, but this is just ridiculous.

You cannot walk on wooden fundations and you cannot walk on single or double foundations. Please fix this it is very annoying and im not able to play the game, because when the shark attacks in a corner you cannot hit him with your spear. This is the same for the zombie. I built a little house on the raft and it spawned behind the wall of my house. Please fix it
I never get any mission do to. Give me an update plz
When will there be quests?  I'm up to level 10 and have a badass raft but there is nothing to do and I can't build the chemistry table. I have no way to get mortar and pedestal.

Edit: Got worse because it costs me money & gold and the broken controls are causing losses. Uninstalling.  Defense. It's broken. I just tracked the touches through the debugger and 2 out of 5 times I swipe right up, but the goalie jumps down. Fix that or many people will switch to other games.. I know I will.

comments: I felt like this be could have so much potential! I thought that the different colours gave you the ability to collect more balls so not really sure what the point of the game is... no way to won or lose ... just click ... I like things with skill... I can handle the ads and would even pay to remove ads if the game have a point.. a purpose a win/lose sort of deal but it's not I don't think I will be keeping this game .. unless they add a little skill to it

It's decent. I like the sounds it makes, and the colours look nice too. The forced ads I can't skip after 5 seconds is the annoying part. I get that you need ads, but come on man. I buy 3 upgrades and have to watch a full minute ad. It's like an ad simulator. Honestly if I wanted to play with balls, and watch ads I'd play with my own balls, and throw some ads on YouTube(this part is mostly for humour). Just so you know I'm not salty, annoyed yes, but not salty.

Ads are non skipable which is awful. Skippable ads are ones that pop up that you don't want usually. The full ads like on this game are only usually shown when you are getting a upgrade to a boost or something free etc. Terrible design as you can't win either

I like the game as it's one when you don't want to think but want to do something. It's very easy. However you watch more ads than you do play the game. So annoying I had to sit through a 1 minute cat chat advert without being able to skip it. Then a 10 second level then another 50 second unskipable ad so annoying

I had to delete this game because every time you buy an upgrade for the ball an ad pops up. There is no reason to be that money hungry. Dont download, you'll just get annoyed because it becomes unplayable really quickly
So... paid for "no ads" which apparently means "some ads are gone but the most annoying ones are still there" no ads should mean no ads. I paid for it now I feel ripped off!

comments: I really love playing skipbo but now the ads are getting to be outrageous. Not only are the ads after every turn you make but now they freeze constantly and I have to shut down and restart it. I would buy the 2$ but that still has ads too; so what's even the point... so dissapointed.

I get that ads should be used to support a free app.. But this game is unplayable due to every ad they insert. Literally after every action is another 30 sec ad. You can't even play the main game because they kill you with ads. Uninstalling.

So many ads they interfere with gameplay! What should be a quick turn becomes a 3 minute play. I don't ads, I support developers making money and even click on ads for bonuses, but this is ridiculous. The game is also laggy, which I suspect if from the ads trying to load. Expect game crashes as well - one occurs every gameplay for me.
Too many ads to the point it's unenjoyable. But other then that the game itself is fun and easy to play. But seriously a 30 second video (that may or may not freeze) every 2-3 turns is ridiculous.
This game would be ALOT better without all the ads every 2 minutes. I had ads popping up after my turn would be up! Really thinking about deleting the game!
This app crashes constantly! Good luck trying to get a game to load! I can get past the add every other turn, if i could just play the game without it crashing.

comments: Not happy! I'm up to level 1521 and for some reason it's taken me back to level 1. What is going on? I've been playing for about a year and NOT happy I'm back to level 1 again. This has now happened to me 3 times where I have been at maximum levels into the legends arena and BOOM! All my levels are gone all my boosters  - which I have paid hundreds of dollars buying are gone. Support do not respond to my repeated requests to resolve this. Very disappointed I've been playing this for almost 2 years.

Just kidding,on it being a baseball game. Great game,but it will begin Cheating me when I get to  Level 160,around there. If I get 5 blues it will only give me credit for 3 or 4 blues. In this way I will not win until the game decides to let me win.

I want to play what the ads showed - matching the tiles and clearing the board. Mindless entertainment, not strategy. Not getting toys to the bottom or clearing bubbles/Legos. If not for the Infinite lives this weekend, I would have Un-installwd the game.

I love this game! Its Super addictive and a great way to pass the time. The only thing i didnt care for was the amount of lives going from 10 to 5.i dont know if its becuase im on such a high level or if its new update. But other then that its a great game. 😳

I would give this more stars but noe my lives are disappearing before i can use them. 2 or 3 times now i accept my 2 hearts from my friends and use 1 thwn after losing the 1 try i get told im out of lives when i should have 1 more! Can you fix this glitch? Im tired of my lives being ripped off.

This is a strategy game,. Much like chess one must plan their moves in advance, keeps your brain sharp. Addictive and challenging, fun an rewarding. Play in the Star Tournament to earn coins and power boosts....takes no money to have fun.

i dont like this game because i was up stairs and people on the bottom floor was still killing me

Hey creator of the game add some more levels and guns ad a taser a magic staff a machine gun with a full range add a dog that gpea and kills 10 enemies in 1 hit oh and this game is number 1 game  in my fav games

description: Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success. ****READY YOUR WEAPONS****They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.**** INTENSE GAME PLAY **** Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select. Features:-Pixel cube graphics-Six levels to conquer -Precision aiming -Radar map-Health meter -Perks & power-ups-Blocky weapon collect
descriptionHTML:
Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success.

****READY YOUR WEAPONS****
They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.

**** INTENSE GAME PLAY ****
Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select.

Features:
-Pixel cube graphics
-Six levels to conquer
-Precision aiming
-Radar map
-Health meter
-Perks & power-ups
-Blocky weapon collect

comments: Awesome game I had ever played in my life... although I'm 20 just..😉😉 I just loved the game.today 21/02/2018 I installed it on my phone.within 1 hr I played 100+ times. Till now my highest score is 74 & I'm in challenge 25. Really loved this game very much. I recommend this game to my each & every friend...(even my enemy also...😂😂 Just kidding) I wished that I will cross 1000+ score on future.  Loved this game. Lots of Love to this game & ketchapp. 😘😘😘❤️❤️❤️

A simple, addictive yet hard and raging game. I love how you can customize your spheres and roads--and to turn off the ads just turn off your WiFi or data. Honestly, after 250 it gets a little impossible to play lol. Keep up the good work, Ketchapp!

Another great game from ketchapp. A very unique idea, executed well and with nice graphics. It is simple yet difficult, a good combination. I gave it 4 stars however, as sometimes the game takes a while to respond to my touch, and often doesn't respond at all. My phone is quite slow though, so I'm willing to give the game the benefit of the doubt.

Enjoyed, On a overall basis i really enjoyed the game. And i also finished all the 100 challenges within a time of 5 days, as the game is really captivating i kept on continuously playing it. But now i am kind of bored from it as there's nothing to do after i have completed the 100 challenges. If there is an addition of another 100 more challenges that would make the game more fun to play and i would enjoy it thoroughly. Also i am not sure how will i earn the other spehers and roads without any challenges, so if anyone can help me how in figuring that out it would be really nice. At the end the game is really good. Cheers to the creaters.

I've noticed that when I get higher in the challenges the ones involving lane switching glitch out and never let me complete it. I have counted and I don't think it is possible for me to have counted incorrectly 20+ times repeatedly. Also now whenever I boot up the game it has the beginner tutorial pop-up telling you what to do which is annoying.

I'm obsessed with this game. It's not just playing to beat your best score. There are challenges that you can beat as you play and it makes it okay to have a bad run sometimes because you can still beat the challenge lol. Not frustrating, just so much fun. Not sure if my review makes sense, just play this game ok.

comments: Overall, game quality is pretty solid. Few graphic glitches here and there but can be expected. It would be nice to rotate to see a better perspective and easier to hit.   One must improvement needed is that when you play a bot, it's way too noticable. You need to improve the bot intelligence! I understand why bots would be needed time to time.  Coins could be cheaper too.

I think it would be a lot better if you could play a single player instead of having to play individuals who are too scared for a rematch. Everything in the game requires making a purchase or waiting an extremely long amount of time to get a free gift. It's fun to play, don't get me wrong. I just feel that it could be better by having the choice of playing others or by yourself.

This is overall the best golf game I have come across or any app, in general, relating to sports. My only problem is that sometimes people do not want to, not do not have the ability to create a facebook account. I wish there would be a way to play with your family; without the facebook account users perks.

This game would be awesome if it matched you with people equal to your level but it doesn't. So I spend more time trying to get to the higher levels and not able to upgrade equipment. Of course you could always purchase money but I'm not big on doibg that!

Main screen isn't immediately obvious what does what. Also a bit annoying that my level changed and I didn't see the wager increased so i was quickly running out of coins until I realised I could step down again. Good game so far though.

I used to think it was a Pretty decent game. But it keeps stealing money. I had $21,000, and went to play a game for $20,000, and it lost connection for a dang second and zap went my coins!  This is the first time its happened with the large coins, but its happened several times with the $1,600
description: Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Do amazing trickshots in Hole in One Challenge. You can also play together with your Facebook friends!Firing your shot is easier than ever. Just drag and release to hit the ball like playing pool! Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. descriptionHTML:
Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!
Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!

Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Do amazing trickshots in Hole in One Challenge. You can also play together with your Facebook friends!

Firing your shot is easier than ever. Just drag and release to hit the ball like playing pool! Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!

Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!

So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!

★★ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ★★

KEY FEATURES
- Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer.
- Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike!
- Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies!
- Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun.
- Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves!
- Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top.
- Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus.
- Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion!
- Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge!
- Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts!
- Play online matches with your family and friends!

* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news!
https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/

* You need an internet connection to play this game.

* Optional Permissions
- Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.
- Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.
- Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches

* How to turn permissions on or off
- Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). Tap "Mini Golf King". Tap "Permissions". Move switches to the right or the left to turn the permissions on or off.
- Android OS earlier than 6.0: You need to upgrade the OS to control each permission. Otherwise you may uninstall "Mini Golf King" app to revoke them as a whole.

comments: This game could use better and easier ways to earn money for opening the chests and scoring or pay outs after each prize or game. So you can get better equipment and achievements. Would help keep players more interested. My only dislikes so far. I most definitely enjoy the game and think it's pretty awesome!

Great game. It is easy to use but still challenging. The controls are smooth and consistent and there are plenty of things you can purchase but don't have to to enjoy the game. Only reasons for losing a star is no way to play alone or practice, it has to be against someone. Also, there is not a way as far as I can find, to turn off notifications. Lastly, it does use battery pretty fast. Is is not a "battery killer", but does drain it faster than other games. However it probably does take a bit of power for all this game does.

Excellent game against real people who reply to you if you click one of the comments (for those who say it's a computer we play against). My only problem with it is there should be an option to buy gems with coins rather than have to always pay real cash for gems. If it had this option I'd give 5 stars!

Was fun at first, then massive losing streak due to other players making every single shot perfect.  But most of the time when I start spending money I do better.  Odd.  I think I found a cheater during a putt.  He lined up correctly, however with the power he should have missed the hole.  I tried to watch the replay, but it is the only replay unavailable.  Then when we do the tie breaker shootout, he hits with pinpoint accuracy on the edge of the rough/fairway to get within 2 ft of the hole.

After playing for a while it just isn't that great.  It shows too much of what other people are doing and then makes you go first.  Which is the opposite of competitive. I've now tried for a few months but honestly it's designed to make you spend cash.  I still play a little but constantly think about uninstalling it.  It gives you a free golden tee shot maybe once a week.  The rewards are meh... Because you know if you won too much you wouldn't need to spend real cash.  For the amount of rewards you get it should play the free golden tee shot 3 times a week.  The best feature is that you can save a shot and upload to YouTube easily.

Rigged. I have lost 12 straight at a much lower level than I'm qualified for, while playing several holes consecutively without a bad shot. Opponents keep making miracle shots, while my perfect shots are suddenly unaffected by the wind, or end up six inches into the rough. This game sucks.  Rigged against players who don't pay.

comments: The improvements have really helped. However there is a problem lately. I bought a GK on transaction mode for 42 coins. I had the player for a few hours and he disappeared. I have reported the issue and even sent screen shots by no response. Please either give the coins back or give the player bought. We spend sleepless nights trying to secure good players. To lose a player and the coins you wanted to spend on the playet leaves a bitter taste on ones mouth. And there is response to query raised. My ID 3549902

Massive bug at the mo! Signed a player with coins, he was in the team for a day but couldn't play him and now he's disappeared with no coins refunded!! In the meantime losing games etc! Sent numerous emails but no solution!!

Not happy at the moment with this game, I'm into my 4th season and have just spent money on 2 new players, my first new player was a striker who played for me in 1 match then disappeared from my team??  The other player a defender has played 2 matches but is for some reason up for sale and I'm unable to remove him . I'm now losing  matches due to my weakened team, (its basically spoilt the season) and have sent 4 e-mails of complaint and have had  no response..
Theres no way of contactin if u dont use facebook.  Players bein transfer listed on their own.  Losin players after updates.  But no way of gettin in touch with any1 2 sort it out
Bought 2 players costing 90 coins both disappeared. Sent messages asking to rectify to no avail.  Quick to take money off you but not to solve issues.

This game will take you so far but if you dont spend money forget it the makers will scum you losing to teams far worse than you , making a sub takes far too long games is constantly full so cant play and aalways in maintenence so cant play , avoid this game but if you do play please dont spent money
description: Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resistDo you dream of coaching a team of eleven stars hungry to be champions? New, free soccer club sim Top Soccer Manager puts sports fans like you in charge! comments: This game keeps crashing to the home screen without warning,same problem with Blossom blast saga.Problem started before few days ago,since I updated both games.This problem keeps happening with android kitkat. Can this problem be solved or should I deinstall all king games I have? I have no problem with games from other developers, so this is on you, not on me.

Awesome game, one of my favourites. Only suggestion would be that the bonus hours of unlimited lives could be gameplay hours, not actual time hours as it is sometimes impossible to continue playing depending on when you are awarded the bonus but on the plus side there are many opportunities to get bonus hours or recharges, much more than many other games.

Fun & super adorable match 3 game - the only game I've kept playing for years (3-4?!) Variety of different mechanics and choice of animal helpers keep it interesting, and less frustrating than the Candy Crush games. Then again, maybe it's just because everything is so darn cute! So nice to see the New Zealand birds/animals in there too, go kiwi! :)

Game don't work on my tablet or android phone. I have Uninstaller it several times and it shuts down within a few minutes. I tried to contact customer support  for help but the game stops before I can type the first words. Can someone please explain why this game stops working?

Since today I've started getting in game app adverts...  Terrible considering it only says in app purchases. What a joke a bit like the stupid pig you gave us for gold bars which you made out to be free but no... Of course you have to purchase so why put that rubbish in the game! If I wanted to check if I have PPI I'd wait for a cold caller, not an in game advert! You take the living p*ss!

comments: Awsome game. Completed all levels without any hack jzt waited  for hope   ( the lives ) evrbdy shld try this. Sry i gonna uninstall this app only bcoz i finished all levels. Each time when u invite me to rate this app i was thinking that i shall rate this 5 if i win the 75th level. Now iam satisfied.... Great timepass.. Nice tactics, waiting 4 more awsome funny levels. If anybody has any diffrnt opinion cntact me on telegram @chichu  this is my user name. Thnx 4 thiz awsome gift babe.

The game is really interesting and entertaining. The graphics are smooth and and the controls are manageable.   The thing I disliked through my game play is that you don't get any clues what you have to do and/or how to defeat the new "enemies". While you understand what exactly you have to do, you've lost some lives. But that's not so important.  I will strongly recommend this game just because of its graphics, entertainment and due the fact, that this game is not pay-to-win game.

I really liked this game. The levels are very challenging and this game is addictive and fun. The only issue is that there are only 5 short lives  that when our lives ran out, we have to wait 18-19 minutes long to have 5 lives again. Of course, there are many hard levels in the game that keeps us dying and think a way to pass the level. So if possible, please shorten the time, like 5-7 minutes only and let us really enjoy the game. It's more even challenging and thrilling if there are many lives. And this game will be really perfect for us. Thank you.

Remember the old days when platformers taught you through trial and error how to interact with new game mechanics? If you don't like that, you'll hate this game. So much fun, so creative, and once you start to get down one of the new features, it ramps it up and keeps you learning creatively how to beat the level. I love this game, it's a fantastic platformer that will challenge you to learn as you go instead of giving you a tutorial every time something new comes up.

Completed all but just couldn't get enough of it. Everyone should play Redball 4. It is D best android games I've ever played. Those who complained about the Game play and control has an abnormal thumb. Easy, Fun & Challenging but nothing impossible to get through. I just hope they make new levels.

Amazing game reminds me of the old school games . But the only problem is the lives you give us to play. They are so few and they take a lot of time to refill. PLEASE remove the life or ball things from this game it will be the best if you do that cause I was playing and level by level I was getting exited and I wanted to rate this game 5 stars but suddenly this GAME OVER thing comes and I had to give you this ratings.please let us play without stopping and waiting for the life to come.

I LOVE it! It's a great time killer, relaxing, challenging, and really fun to play! I don't know why people are complaining about the ads. There really aren't a lot of them and they aren't too annoying. I love the game!
Love the game and the graphics! But the ads and videos are coming on alittle too much that it's pretty annoying and time wasting.

It was cool for the first few levels. Every couple of levels you would get a pop up ad but the higher you get in the levels the ads start coming in the middle of the level and they pop up like every 10 seconds.  It's ridiculous.

description: This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!>How to play?Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.>Highlights:Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
descriptionHTML:
This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!
It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.
It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!

>How to play?
Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.
Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.

>Highlights:
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.
You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
summary: Amazing block game with a simple rule.
title: Puzzle Game

comments: Just downloaded this app.  So far a very well executed app with excellent layout and controls/easy and fluid to use.  Much better than other Sodoku b/c no ads during actual game play!  The only "con" is that I cant put graphics behind gameboard. Only suggestion: Would like to see options for backgrounds like in Solitaire. This would truely make it a 5 star game!   Ps. I was not paid/reimbursed or otherwise incentivised for this review in any way.

I like this app, but it feels like it could be more educational. I get stuck on the expert puzzles and often have to use the hints, the way the hints just tell you the number in a selected square doesn't help me work out what I'm missing. If the hint could show me how I could reveal another number would be more helpful to me. Otherwise top notch app

Great app. I can do Sudoku on the app with the 'write' facility for numerical notes and I like how it removes them automatically as you fill in other areas. But I still find it very difficult to do paper Sudokus because I can't fill in the right answers without loads of workings out on the more challenging puzzles. The app makes this aspect easy.

I would greatly prefer to start by touching a number rather than touching a cell.  I have to hunt for a cell with the number I am working with, touch that to show where all instances of that number are, then touch each cell and the number to place either the number or a note that this might be the number.  If I could select the number first, I would only have to touch each cell to place that number, then turn on "note mode" and touch each cell for a note.  Only half the taps per game, saving both time and the muscles in my arthritic hands!

Great app! Loads quickly, gameplay is smooth and intuitive. I also haven't found the different levels of difficulty to be repetitive, which is a good thing. I have found with other Sudoku apps, a pattern emerges from each of difficulty so that I almost know what the puzzle will look like by picking how hard it will be.  This one isn't like that thankfully!

Easy to use.   Love the pencil so you can mark choices.   Also like that it tells you if you make a stupid mistake like putting the same number in a column.   Haven't tried the hint feature yet,  but hoping it will help me learn when I don't see any options.
description: Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.Features✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuckMore features- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakesHighlights• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles• 9x9 grid• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert• Support both phones and tablets• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets• Simple and intuitive designTrain your brain anywhere, anytime!
descriptionHTML:
Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.

Features
✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies
✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features
- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes

Highlights
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert
• Support both phones and tablets
• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
• Simple and intuitive design

Train your brain anywhere, anytime!

summary: Play classic Sudoku and train your brain for FREE!
title: Sudoku

comments: This game is just about money with no reward. Gets boring after a month and even through my power is over 3100 i can't beat 2800 power quests....Ummhmm....seems I do the exact damage I did when I started...mechanics are messed up..and no purpose

Very good game and a great time killer. It can take some time to get your team up to strength to fight certain levels. They have spoiled the game slightly with the all new alliance wars  that some people didn't want. It's impossible to find items to ascend your hero's to the next level to make them stronger. Also to level up troops it costs a lot of in game food to level them up. You need a lot of patience to play this game. If not then don't download. I wish I hadn't now.

I've been playing this game for sorry one year now and I do like it but it has a few flaws.  It takes a very long time to level up heroes, it's very hard to get good heroes because it's just by chance, and you don't get very many gems at a time if you want to get anywhere in this game you have to spend money.  Now they have a VIP 4.99 for a month you get 30 gems a day, and extra regular summon, and instead of just be able to upgrade one building at a time you can do two at a time.  It really is helping me get all my buildings to the same level. There is also alliance wars now and they also have challenges.  With a few tweaks I would give this game 5 stars hands down.  I definitely recommend it.

Great if you buy your way through the game. The fun lasts a few hours and then it's an endless grind of frustration. You won't get any better characters unless you purchase them with microtransactions and will lose....... A LOT.  Greed wins and the sheep that can throw their money at a mobile game will triumph.

Feels like there's too much going on at once with the base and everything, and it eats up an ungodly amount of battery... But it's a cool game! Match 3 with strategy RPG assets. The strongest point is definitely the art.

I enjoyed this game for some time but after a while your forced to spend real money & or grind & grind to be able to level to be decent enough to get anywhere.! Would be nice if you could watch videos to get free stuff besides only 1 per day..

comments: Think about playing all day Ridiculously good graphics for a mobile game, excellent soundtrack that matches the intensity of each level, and never gets boring. The free version makes you restart from the beginning instead of checkpoints, but I don't even mind because it's still challenging and fun with each replay. I do wish I could play in a different mode for free though. This would be an awesome Zen game.

The gameplay is unique and challenging and fun but this game feels like a demo as all the other game modes (PvP , co-op etc) are locked for free users. And you can't even use checkpoints without paying them( like SERIOUSLY?!) So once the game is over you have to start all over again if you are a free user. Apart from that this game definitely deserves a try from people looking for casual , relaxing yet challenging gameplay.

Great game This is a wonderful game, with great gameplay, amazing aesthetics and highly addictive. Totally worth the $2 for the premium version. I do have one problem though: even though I am pretty decent at the game, Google Play won't give me any achievements even though I'm sure I have earned some. It won't even let me open achievements or leaderboard pages. Is anybody else having this issue?

I am going crazy for this game. Great time killer and stress reliever. Graphics, music, and everything else is completely superb. I am totally enthusiastic about purchasing the premium version, however, I could not buy it because I do not have any credit or debit card. Can someone please tell me if there is other ways to purchase, like deducting the fee directly from my SIM balance, perhaps?

BEST GAME EVER... Love this game,  a must have on every phone.. Well worth the price, amazing graphics.. Also bought the VR version truly unbelievable. Just 1 wee problem... When you reach infinity there is not a lot of glass to smash for extra balls which is a must have especially when it goes super fast.  Thankyou and keep up the great work..

Excellent game. Really superb game. Engaging play and the music works well. Plus fantastic breaking sounds. This game is both addictive and relaxing. Reminds me of the original wipeout. Another cool element is that each level adds interesting new elements. Only thing that would make it better is if my acheivements would track. Im on a galaxy s 7, and they don't track. At least my checkpoints save.
description: Take a surreal journey through an otherworldly dimension, move in harmony with sound and music and smash everything in your path! This experience requires focus, concentration, and timing to not only travel as far as you can, but also break the beautiful glass objects that stand in your way.* Smash your way through a beautiful futuristic dimension, smashing obstacles and targets in your path and experiencing the best destruction physics on mobile devices.* Musically synchronized gameplay: music and audio effects change to suit each stage, obstacles move to each new tune.* Over 50 different rooms with 11 different graphic styles, and realistic glass-breaking mechanics in every stage.Smash Hit is playable at no cost and free from ads. An optional premium upgrade is available through a one-time in-app purchase that will enable new game modes, cloud save across multiple devices, detailed statistics and the ability to continue from checkpoints.

comments: Brilliant, innovative, addictive game BUT please reduce the number of ads. That's why this game is only averaging  3.5* and why I can only give it 4*. People will stop playing very quickly as it currently is. Just take it down to an ad break every end of run. Also a way to easily view all positions on the leader board would be nice. Otherwise the game itself is great.

Game is great, but every time you die (and that's really easy to do) you need to watch about 22 seconds of ads. Once i got a 15 second ad, but the skip time stayed constant and i had to watch the entire thing. The game also bugs you constantly about connecting your facebook account. So if you want to be able to play without interruptions constantly, you need to pay and connect to a facebook account.

I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.

Too many ads with a skip button that reduces ad time by 10 seconds. Literally, f off, dude. Can't play your game, I play for a minute and than watch an ad for half of that time. Unfair and boring. You almost don't get to play the game. Which is, btw, awesome

Visually satisfying, nice, fitting soundtrack and pretty innovative. One thing is that it's extremely packed with ads. One every round you play. Maybe dial it down a little?  Also, maybe add tail patterns...
It's a great game, for users complaining about ads, it's called ad blocker. When devs force a billion ads and make it unplayable, I use adaway, game is great after, but without adaway, don't bother!

descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

Drive around and see the sights like rivers and lakes, an ancient Japanese temple, airport with other aircrafts and planes, secluded houses and farms, ruins, a camping place, and more...
The road system is also very dense, with highways and 2x2 lanes, to the very small roads of mountains, with hill-climb.


Features :
- Hugely open-world driving simulator with city, construction, dockyard environments... filled with wide open roads, mountains, hills and forests
- Miles of roads to drift and drive on and do stunt jumps
- Full customization for police cop cars
- Dynamic traffic with real and intense traffic AI
- Realistic driving simulator, ultimate driving experience
- Realistic drifting physics
- High-quality vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles
- Easy to play driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!

You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.

Show off your amazing drifting and car driving skills, perform awesome car stunts in one of the best free car driving simulators available!

This game offers the massive open world for the best car driving simulator game experience! Race, drift, crash, jump, and flip around a huge detailed open city, perform tricks and stunts, and have fun! The most realistic and extreme car driving game you'll ever experience, Police Drift Car Driving Simulator!

comments: Wont open load or do anything even with newest update please fix! Every time there is an update it messes up and won't load the levels I'm on. Frustrated because I love the game itself. Getting so mad it won't load every single time it updates! I was trying to get to 1500 before my birthday fat chance in hell now.

I would give this game 5 stars because I do love playing it. But it gives bonus's daily that are supposed to last 2 hours and mine have only been lasting 15 minutes! I have contacted them multiple times and they still haven't fixed it.

Loved this game. Very addictive. But just like other recent reviews, since March 2018 problems with no help at all from company. Have not received about 4 gift boxes or rewards for at least 4 levels even tho i completed them. Doesnt advance either. I have to search what level i stopped at. On one of my devices says no internet connection and sent me back. Have stopped playing on that device. Contacted company twice to no avail. Will search for a new game with totally different company

Do not waste your money on the game. I use to enjoy it and had no problem paying for things. I believe a company should make money if they do their job. Since it was sold to a new owner they no longer answer anyone's questions. They send you to a link that has everyone else scrambling for answers. They also do not replace items you lose when the game has problems. They do not care if you purchased them. The old company use to replace items and gold bars when it was the games glitches. They actually cared about the people playing it. The owners now can not even be bothered to reply. If you play it only get the free stuff. Do not waste your hard earned money on this game. They will not spend any time to make sure you get what you paid for

While you have infinite lives a great time waster. Also great if you want to spend silly amounts of money on a few power ups that  won't get you through the hard levels. And all the 'are you sure you want to quit instead of buying some more gold bars/candy hammers/whatevers' just make even trying to quit a level tiresome. If it takes too many attempts to pass a level I get bored, and that is where I am today. Bye.
Why did bubblegum hill disappear in the middle of the day today? Also the power ups are not staying the allotted amount of time either? I've spent money on this app but won't spend anymore!

descriptionHTML:
Start playing Candy Crush Soda Saga today - already enjoyed by millions of players around the world!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is the divine puzzle game from King, the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Farm Heroes Saga and more! Switch and match candies to create 3 in a row, or match 4 (or more) to make delicious special candies! Complete the goals before you run out of moves to progress through deliciously fun levels. It's that simple!

Switch and match scrumptious candies to make mouth-watering combinations and play challenging game modes brimming with purple soda and Candy Bears! Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

New Candy Crush Soda Saga features: 

* Over 1000 Sodalicious levels
* New Game Modes include:
Soda – switch bottles and candies to release purple soda and save the Candy Bears
Frosting – match candies to smash the ice and set the Candy Bears free
Honey – match candies next to the honey to release the trapped Candy Bears
* Scrumptious new candies and sublime new combinations:
Match 4 candies in a square to make a Swedish Fish
Match 7 candies to create the remarkable Coloring Candy
* Explore juicy new environments and meet the kookiest characters
* Mouth-watering new graphics, Candy Crush never looked so tasty
* Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master
* For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Sodalicious scores
* Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internet

This mouth-watering puzzle adventure will instantly quench your thirst for fun. Join Kimmy on her juicy journey to find Tiffi, by switching and matching your way through new dimensions of magical gameplay. Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Are you already a fan of the new Candy Crush Soda Saga?  If so then visit our website, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

www.candycrushsodasaga.com
facebook.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga 
twitter.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Soda Saga!

comments: In all honesty I LOVE Jetpack Joyride! The things I DON'T love are these: I don't love all the ads...it never use to have all these ads. I don't love that it freezes up on my phone 9/10 forcing me to force stop it to play it. I don't love the fact that despite having it on other android devices and having synced it after getting a new phone I STILL had to start from scratch.

Game is becoming worst day by day.hey change the developers man!! Always getting strucked whenever a mission is done, there's a delay time,where your bloody joyride sucks and strucks. All of a sudden releases from the mission completed hangover and will come in to the game flow.and ends the game due to sudden activation,by touching zappers or missiles. All the testers who didn't discovered this hangover should be thrown out from the company

I love the game overall, but the only downside I have for it, is how we're not getting discounts on jepacks and clothing anymore. I'm unsure if it's only an android thing, but I really miss that feature. That for me was the reason I grinded this game so much during the time, because I was able to buy them with 50% off, not just buy currency and get it straight away. It would be nice to see some more jepacks too, as well as other content.
Most addictive game I've played in years. Only gripe is when holding screen to speed up end of level timer it restarts 2-3 times.

The game is amazing. I've been playing this since it came out about 7 years ago. The thing is it brings back nostalgia for me and that plays a big part in the core gameplay for me. Thank you guys, you are amazing! One little issue though, sometimes the ads I watch for doubling the points or for the free revive don't work. It just says "an error occured" and it won't do anything. Could you please try to fix this. It's a shame after a good run not to be able the double my points or whenever I would need to revive, it just wouldn't work...
I read their comments and they said that they're dying because of the ads.. For me the ads is okay because its not appearing on my screen so thank you and 5 Stars for all

comments: This app is really fun... but the multiplayer seems to only work the the first time you open the app after going back into the app which I've deleted and redownloaded twice it says there is and error I've reset my phone as well. So if this can be fixed this'll be an almost perfect app
