You need to jump over faults, dodge traps and keep away from dragons, elephants and tigers as well as those sweet elves with carts. Collect energy bottles during the way to help you run farther!If you are able to catch a dragon as mount, you will be unstoppable for a while. The most fun in game is to run after robbers and take back your gold.Be confident to face with all the obstacles! Run as far as you can to be the winner!Unlock new scenes to experience different running style! Collect more gold to build your home in dream!Are you ready to start this wonderful running adventure?Features:Fantastic running scenesRun as far as you canComfortable sound effectFun of building unique homeland
descriptionHTML:
Run Ninja Fun Run is the best endless running game! Come on to challenge your friends and breakthrough their records in this game.
Welcome to explore this endless running world! Here you will run with the loveliest Ninja rabbit in forest. Speed up to surpass other rivals to be the fastest runner!
It is a wonderful forest adventure but it is not easy to complete the task. You need to jump over faults, dodge traps and keep away from dragons, elephants and tigers as well as those sweet elves with carts. Collect energy bottles during the way to help you run farther!
If you are able to catch a dragon as mount, you will be unstoppable for a while. The most fun in game is to run after robbers and take back your gold.
Be confident to face with all the obstacles! Run as far as you can to be the winner!
Unlock new scenes to experience different running style! Collect more gold to build your home in dream!
Are you ready to start this wonderful running adventure?

Features:
Fantastic running scenes
Run as far as you can
Comfortable sound effect
Fun of building unique homeland
recentChanges: Run as far as you can
summary: Join us in this running adventure to collect gold and build your homeland!
title: Run Talking Ninja Run!

comments: Smurfymurf.  Now that's a Smurf! Did they ever mean something to you? Then you just have to get it ! Super nice!!! And technically very well done too !!!   Oooooooooops !!!! Update few days later...   Suddenly the game keeps crashing randomly...   Tried it for days....   Can hardly survive a single level now...    Very sad....   The game itself is still excellent....   Maybe a later update brings a fix..................

Fun game, my daughter enjoys playing. ..easy, yet challenging at the same time.  One irritating issue...every time there's an update, or just opening the app, turns on the game's notifications..and have to turn it off constantly. ..otherwise it would be a rare 5 star rating from me.

This is by far one of the best games I have played like this all year. Very addicting, easy, but challenging enough to keep you wanting to come back play some more. Haven't found something I don't like about this game just yet😁

The game isn't letting go of the balls. When I let it go, it switches to the other available ball. I may spend 10 minutes trying to shoot a ball. Very annoying & irritating, but I like everything else!
Like with all other games this game is rigged, once you get to a certain level you are set up to fail unless you buy coins. I don't play games so I can go broke on coins, I don't like this.
PLEASE HELP - game keeps freezing on level 137 no matter how many time I try or restart. I was hoping update would fix it but still doesnt work. Thanks!
description: Ready, aim — pop! Embark on a colorful, bubble shooting adventure with all your favorite Smurfs in Smurfs Bubble Story! Travel with Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Clumsy and rest of the Smurfs family, on a quest across a forbidden forest, mysterious meadows and rushing rivers to pick up the other Smurfs kids who have gone lost.  Join these little blue folks on an amazing magic adventure as they discover new Smurfs, explore the Smurf world, and go toe to (smaller and very blue) toe with Gargamel.  Earn rewards, unleash special moves, and expand your Smurfs collection as you puzzle pop your way to victory!  Line up the perfect shot and trigger massive chain reactions by using each Smurf's individual amazing abilities.  --FEATURES-- MATCH BUBBLES - Pop matching bubbles to collect tons of magical items. BUILD YOUR SMURFS COLLECTION - Collect all unique Smurfs for special abilities to blitz through missions.  FEATURING YOUR FAVORITE BLUE FRIENDS - Just like in the cartoons, meet Smurfette, Hefty, Brainy, Clumsy, and more. HUNDREDS OF MISSIONS - Countless missions with addictive, yet challenging obstacles. EXPLORE A BEAUTIFUL WORLD - Journey through the Smurfdom filled with stunning visual assets from the movie. PLAY BOSS BATTLES - Face off against Gargamel and his minions in bubble blasting showdown to win special booster powers! COMPLETE BONUS MISSIONS - Limited-time challenges to unlock exclusive rewards and new Smurfs! GET SOCIAL – Connect to Facebook to play your friends and gift extra lives. CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS – Beat your friends at collecting the most Smurfs.   If you have issues, questions, or comments please email us at SmurfsSupport@spe.sony.com. We want to hear directly from you!   NOTE: If you uninstall Smurfs Bubble Story (or if your device is lost, stolen or destroyed), all unused consumables (In-app purchases) will not be refunded and cannot be transferred to new devices or accounts. comments: I just wanted to play Tetris. Happy to pay for it, was hoping I could pay a $5-10 purchase price and then have the game and play it to my liking. No, need to join the T Club (who comes up with this) and pay an ongoing fee. It's TETRIS from the 80s, EA must you milk everything. Nothing is sacred

Classic tetris with modern graphics, you can use one touch controls or classic directional pad if you wish, both have their own advantage. I am afraid I can't find Bradinsky song. It's okay for me with advisement because EA need something to eat right? Lol

Enjoyed it at first, and short adverts were expected, but recently adverts have become longer, and now last longer than the game. The latest video advert lasted inbetween games lasted 8 mins....ridiculous!!!. I understand the need for adverts, but if you can't play the game, the adverts are pointless, espeacially if it makes players quit.
Great game, but there's an annoying window that pops up everytime I try and start a new marathon. The window is pretty much useless and wastes my time. Would give this 5 stars if it gets patched

Great game and builds on. The original. The only thing stopping it getting the 5* rating is that the ads on it are sometimes several minutes long and at times when they have finished you can't return to the game. I don't mind watching them as I know that's what funds it, but they are putting me off playing now.

Trying to play Tetris with these abysmal touch and swipe controls is an absolute abject mess. Just add some virtual buttons in, since your loot-boxing asses are supposedly so focussed on 'player choice' lately.
description: Don’t miss out on one of the best-selling mobile games of all time – free to download! Rediscover the world-famous Tetris® game you know and love, with all-new features and ways to play. Keep your lines clear and keep your cool as things heat up in this puzzle game that’s easy to pick up, but difficult to master. This is Tetris®, reimagined.GO THE DISTANCE IN MARATHON MODE  Create the perfect strategy and keep your lines clear with endless Tetrimino action. Choose between original Swipe and One-Touch controls in this traditional Tetris® mode.DISCOVER THE TETRIS® GALAXYDig for the galaxy’s core using as few Tetriminos as possible in this multi-level puzzle mode. Exchange Coins for Power-ups and transform Tetrimino blockades into amazing rewards.COMPETE FOR THE TOPShow off your skills in the new Explorers Mode. Challenge yourself and other players when you go head-to-head with the competition. TRACK YOUR PROGRESSKeep a tally of every line you’ve cleared, or link to Facebook to compete with friends in Tetris® Rank. You can even brag about those sky-high scores on your newsfeed!Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy (privacy.ea.com) and User Agreement (terms.ea.com.  Visit http://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries. comments: So, this is an awesome, addictive and fun, satisfying game to play and it is really good if you want to become a nail artist. Also there is too many ads. I am not interested! And you can't cross them off unless you download the app! What point is that?! And I cannot move and make the stickers bigger on match this so I can't complete it. Help! Sort this out!

I actually had this game a long time ago but have not rate this yet. At first all the colours were not unlocked yet so i was pretty disappointed. After a while everthing was unlocked so i was super excited. It doesn't get me board everytime i have different desins to do.

A really nice game which also got me hooked up! Nevertheles, it frequently and automatically shuts down, deleting what was there.....this really broke my litlle sister's heart, even mine. For we were working on one for a long time and after one of thise repetitive ads, the app shut down.....

Its the BEST game I EVER played! Also, when I was 4, we didnt unlock anything. Now I am 17 and we have every thing for free! I love glitchs. Dont try to fix them though!  I love them and u sould 2. Peace out!

Cute Its a very nice game. The best thing I liked in this game is that everything is already unlocked, we don't need to spend real money or even coins in the game. It has so many options for colours, designs and stickers. But it also has too many adds. On the whole I liked it very much

description: A thrilling ride through jungle, caves and treetops. Play as Kong! Banana Kong!Run, jump, bounce and swing on vines as you help Banana Kong to outrun a huge banana avalanche! Keep full control with highly responsive single-finger tap and swipe controls. Ride the boar or fly with the toucan to overcome dangerous obstacles like massive boulders, crocodiles, piranhas and boiling lava. Nature can be a cruel enemy… While you dash through the jungle you'll be able to outrun your friends! Thanks to full Game Services integration you can see your friends best distance right in the game. Compare your high scores and unlock achievements while improving your playing style. A highly dynamic game engine will provide endless fun in this neverending run. Each session is a new challenge as the level is built randomly on the fly.Collect as many bananas as possible to fill your energy bar. Use a power-dash to destroy obstacles or take alternative routes like the deep underground cave area or treetops. Find secrets and unlock extras to get the most out of the game. Features: - Cloud Save- HD Display support- Full Game Services integration- Ride animals- One thumb controls- 10 seconds from launching the game to playing it.
descriptionHTML:
A thrilling ride through jungle, caves and treetops.
Play as Kong! Banana Kong!


Run, jump, bounce and swing on vines as you help Banana Kong to outrun a huge banana avalanche! Keep full control with highly responsive single-finger tap and swipe controls.

Ride the boar or fly with the toucan to overcome dangerous obstacles like massive boulders, crocodiles, piranhas and boiling lava. Nature can be a cruel enemy…

While you dash through the jungle you'll be able to outrun your friends! Thanks to full Game Services integration you can see your friends best distance right in the game. Compare your high scores and unlock achievements while improving your playing style.

comments: I really enjoy this game has been the only game that has kept my attention for more than a week. Working on week 3 now, most of the game is free but if you want to grow your port quickly than you will need to play into the game. The game really starts to slow down after level 50, I'm up in the high 60 levels now. I do really enjoy all the quests and they do add bonus quests from time to time to help build up your port.

A fun, easy-going game. No crazy-pace required and easy to advance.  The amount of unique ships is crazy, I think only fan of nautical history would really enjoy this aspect. The list of active ships should be available from your town, instead of only from map view. Other than that, it's quite enj9yable and not a complete time-sucker like many 9ther games. Well done.

You have a great game here.  It's messing up lately?  But Seriously, I've spent many hours playing this super enjoyable game!  Side note.  Do phone game developers understand I only want to spend $5 to $20 per game?  There must be some serious suckers out there.

I was disappointed with the "loot boxes" that were offered after the most recent update. I bought two and just got resources. I get they're a gamble, but when gems are so expensive to buy, I don't like to waste them. Sad. I hope they respect their player base in the future. Their constant updates are nice, though.

Hey Dev, just a suggestion... you would sell WAY MORE gems if you priced them appropriately. Your current pricing is ridiculous! Change your prices and maybe add a few more option packs and I bet you would sell way more and make more.

I would of given this game 5 stars a week ago, but I spent money to buy the starter pack, and then updated the game and have since lost everything. This game was awesome until that point. I sent a email a few days ago in response to my game being wiped but have not received any response from them, not even an auto reply.
description: Behold, sailors! No time for relaxing on the beach! YOUR SHIP FLEET AWAITS!Do you have what it takes to develop the biggest sea transport business, manage the most powerful ship fleet and become a wealthy tycoon? Try it now! Get ready for an exciting journey through the history of ships! Expand your ship collection from very basic boats to the enormous warships. Build your own port and enter the world of sea & cargo trade!NAVY FEATURES:⚓ New content every week⚓ Build up your port⚓ Themed events every month⚓ Buy real historic ships⚓ Finish contracts from famous sailors and explorers⚓ Trade with your friends⚓ Explore unknown lands⚓ Expand and manage your fleet⚓ Sail uncharted waters and explore new landsStart as a little fishing village, grow it into town and continue building until you become the most prosperous port city in the whole world! Embark on a sea journey through the history of ships from the age of discovery to the modern days.COLLECT SHIPSRelive the history of sailing by collecting real historical ships. Join the famous explorers in their adventures and finish the contracts to obtain special rewards.DEVELOP YOUR PORTRaise new buildings and manage the production of materials. Build a home port of the largest fleet among your friends!EXPLORE NEW LANDSAttracted by the unknown? Discover new destinations that expand your world. Sail the seas and trade with materials and exotic commodities. THEMED EVENTSVikings, Pirates, Romans and many more. You will have chance to show the power of your fleet in the new events, starting every month. descriptionHTML:
Behold, sailors! No time for relaxing on the beach! YOUR SHIP FLEET AWAITS!

Do you have what it takes to develop the biggest sea transport business, manage the most powerful ship fleet and become a wealthy tycoon? Try it now! Get ready for an exciting journey through the history of ships! Expand your ship collection from very basic boats to the enormous warships. Build your own port and enter the world of sea & cargo trade!

NAVY FEATURES:
⚓ New content every week
⚓ Build up your port
⚓ Themed events every month
⚓ Buy real historic ships
⚓ Finish contracts from famous sailors and explorers
⚓ Trade with your friends
⚓ Explore unknown lands
⚓ Expand and manage your fleet
⚓ Sail uncharted waters and explore new lands

Start as a little fishing village, grow it into town and continue building until you become the most prosperous port city in the whole world! Embark on a sea journey through the history of ships from the age of discovery to the modern days.

COLLECT SHIPS
Relive the history of sailing by collecting real historical ships. Join the famous explorers in their adventures and finish the contracts to obtain special rewards.

DEVELOP YOUR PORT
Raise new buildings and manage the production of materials. Build a home port of the largest fleet among your friends!

EXPLORE NEW LANDS
Attracted by the unknown? Discover new destinations that expand your world. Sail the seas and trade with materials and exotic commodities.

THEMED EVENTS
Vikings, Pirates, Romans and many more. You will have chance to show the power of your fleet in the new events, starting every month. Enjoy obtaining and trading with a few special commodities, sailing to shipwrecks for amazing rewards and much more!

Do not hesitate and prepare your fleet!

descriptionHTML:
-Over 3,000,000 Downloads!-
Thanks to your support, we now share the happiness and joy of toy games with millions of players all over the world!

-Description-
Time can change many things, but not everything. Take a time travel to your dearest childhood, continue your unfinished adventure and join this toy game!
Lead your green army soldiers, remote-control planes, rubber ducks, transformers and many other toys to defend your bedroom, hallway, living room and backyard against the invasion of the Evil Legion! To experience a great war game!

-Features-
Lilliputian Toy War:
• Build Headquarters in your bedroom, use the moneybox as your treasury, transport resources with your little train, and collect metal with magnets. Every houseware has its unique function in this toy world!
• Fight the enemies in the kitchen, the living room and even the bathroom! The adventurous and playful battlefields will make war interesting and fun!

Grow Your Army:
• Design and assemble ultimate strategic bomber to strike out your enemies!
• Recruit the elite toys as heroes to lead your army, let the toy war commence!
• Upgrade and promote your green army soldiers, flamethrowers, snipers, tanks, artillery units and many more troops of various types to teach your enemy a lesson!

Expand and Exterminate:
• Compete with real players for more territory, greater power and higher prestige.
• Build fortifications to keep invaders at bay.

Strategize to Win:
• It takes patience and strategic moves. Build and deploy your troops with heroes wisely. With a good strategy, you can defeat enemy troops much bigger than yours in size!
• Outwit your enemy with intelligence and timing rather than brutal force.

Play with Global Players:
• Get to know friends with the same interest and ambition as yours in the alliance.
• Compete or cooperate with other alliances. Diplomacy or War, it’s up to you!
• Chat with players from all over the world without barrier anytime and anywhere.

-We Are Waiting For You!-
Childhood is unforgettable, and the toy soldier game is irreplaceable. Join us in the toy world and it will be a better place with your participation!

PLEASE NOTE: Army Men Strike is free to download and play, Some Game items that can also be purchased for real money. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ArmyMenStrike/

Pokfulam Road, Hong Kong, China

title: Army Men Strike

comments: Absolutely nothing to do after completing campaign mode because all the events after RQ100 are pvp based and with a RQ150 limit while you are only around RQ110 - 115 when you complete campaign.  Even if you paid a lot of real cash to roll for good S class cars it does not mean you could go further after the relatively short campaign mode.  The game is so dead after you 100% the campaign and there will hardly be any reward for you to make way to RQ125 + in order to be competitive in those pvp events again.  This game probably just last 2 weeks tbh.  Great hope and great let down.

Couple if things wrong with it. 1. If you 3* an event, when collecting your 3 rewards it sometimes kicks you out ofter collecting only 1 or 2. 2. And this has really naffed me off. I've taken part in 2 events today and was in 1st place. I've logged back in and it says i'm unranked as if i haven't taken part - glitch or hack from another player?!?!?

I think this game is amazing! And is perfectly good in every way!! I can't stop playing and look forward to getting new cars. There is just one tiny error that bugs me a bit but I can cope with it. The error is the color of the Ford fiesta xr2. When you race someone else and they have this vehicle on the card the car is black with a tiny red trim on the side but when it's on the track it is completely red. I do hope you can will fix this small mistake but apart from that this game is great!!! Thanks for reading :)

Definitely a game for car buffs. It requires using your "mind" to win. I'm not to sure about my rating yet. But, will definitely change if needed. It's unlike any game I've played & I like it! Someone wrote a review that this is a lazy person's game... LMAØ, I wish they would show me the games they play while they are running, swimming & mountain climbing "while" they play, smh HAHA!

I love the concept and it's been great to see how far this game has come, but I've been playing since beta and nearly every update wipes my save data and forces me to restart. Luckily, I don't get too far into the game each time, but it is frustrating and enough of a buzz kill for me to drop two stars. If there was a cloud system implemented for saves this game would be a five star in my book

Update 2/22/18: Pay to win alert: The developers don't care/wont help. I've literally been trying for 5 months now to beat the final boss and i still cant win. This game is not worth your time if you're looking for a "fun" for everyone game. Its a pay to win lie of a game. I loved this game but sadly i give up. WAY too frustrating. Don't bother asking the developer for help. They'll just make an update that makes it even more frustrating to beat.

comments: More or less meh, can do with or without. For this edit I've lowered my rating since after update. Sure clan stuff looks nicer and I was excited about the infinite scouts for videos, however that perk is gone. Really makes me lose interest since I'm not gonna pay to play. Not to mention it also recently got way more difficult to get gems and overall this game is getting pathetic.

Love the game. The game play is great. Only down side is that I feel that the game cheats against me sometimes by adding enemies. Only happened about 3 times now. ***edit*** I have since realized there are certain pigs that do add more pigs when hit. The game doesn't cheat. I'm extremely happy with the game play and ability to build a great team without paying a whole bunch of money. You just need patients and good planning.

Personally I don't like PvP system in this game. You don't play with other players in real time so I even don't know how it can be called PvP. Additionally system put you with a player which has much more power than you, so there is no chance to win. Time wasting.

the game is really fun and humorous. I love the clan feature- found a great clan to be part of. there are glitches that rovio needs to iron out that affect play. I am hoping this new big update helps fix all that. the changes look to be really good. excited to see what they've done.

I did not expect to enjoy this nearly as much as I have. The frequent events are nice and having a guild just makes them better. I don't feel compelled to be social be because there is no chat, just playing the game. It is a wonderful balance.

Only had the game a few days. Was going great till the update today and like many i hit the fetching player profile and it has a server error and cannot connect. Glad i haven't spent months on this game like others for this to happen. Hope the problem is resolved soon. It had become and addicting game.

comments: The game was ok, I dont like it because the music kinda sounded like a mess, when I tapped it took forever to register, and forgot to add that the music sounded like a 2 year old trying to play an instrument. Background needed decoration and different colors than just yellow. It was also very glitchy and I deleted it in the first 30 seconds of me playing it. Forgot to add about music, it sounded like a mash of tons of people trying to sing and play instruments  and tons of animals making noise.

Nothing fantastic, those bouncing birds are from forever ago. The music in the background sounds like a 4 year old tried  to copy candy crush and crash bandicoot. The ads tho.. just too much. Made me uninstall immediately.
Great Game! I found what I was looking for! A breather from the same ol' same games out there...this birdy challenge cracks me up and keeps me on my beak, I mean toes! Lol...
Art theft. The artist already contacted them but the person who created the game claimed that it's different only because it's for the game when the animation is the exact same.

The art was copied from a artist called kéké. You can find examples of their art on YouTube by kéké and on Tumblr at k-eke. As far as I've seen, the examples they gave on Tumblr match up with the ones in the game. And when confronted the company refused to acknowledge it. Delete the game.
Art is stolen from a artist called Kéké (@Kekeflipnote on Twitter). I hope this app fails completely.

comments: Fun! Creative!
description: In der App können Kinder in die liebevoll gestaltete Schnipselwelt eintauchen. Gemeinsam mit Kikaninchen gehen sie auf spannende Erkundungstouren und gestalten Schnipseltiere im Bauernhof, erfinden abenteuerliche Fahrzeuge und probieren sie aus oder schauen ihre Lieblingssendungen aus dem KiKANiNCHEN Fernsehprogramm.Die App versteht sich nicht als Spiel, sondern vielmehr als vielseitiges Spielzeug und Begleiter: spielerisches Entdecken und Ausprobieren, anregende und lustige Spiele ohne Zeitdruck, kreatives Gestalten und Musizieren stehen dabei im Vordergrund. Eine App, die mit dem Kind wächst und an der das Kind wachsen kann – ohne  Werbung oder Inhalte, die Vorschulkindern Angst machen oder sie überfordern.Die KiKANiNCHEN-App ist ein Angebot für App-Einsteiger, das sich an dem Entwicklungsstand und den Bedürfnissen der jungen Medienanfänger orientiert. In enger Zusammenarbeit mit Medienpädagogen wurde das Angebot entwickelt, um Kindern einen geschützten Raum zu bieten, in dem sie ihre ersten Erfahrungen im Umgang mit Apps sammeln können. Die textfreie und kinderleichte Steuerung der App ist ideal für Vorschulkinder im Alter ab drei Jahren. Es gibt viel zu entdecken:- 3 Spiele,- 5 Mini-Spiele, - zielgruppengerechte und wechselnde Videoangebote aus dem öffentlich-rechtlichen Fernsehangebot von ARD, ZDF und KiKA,- liebevoll und abwechslungsreich gestaltete Welten: unter Wasser, im Weltall, im Wald, auf einer Schatzinsel, auf einem Piratenschiff etc. Das bietet die App:- multisensorische Steuerung über Touchen, Pusten, Klatschen, Schütteln und Singen, - sie ist kostenlos, ohne In-App-Käufe oder sonstigen Werbeangebote,- Download-Funktion von Videos zur Offline-Nutzung,- Personalisierungsmöglichkeiten,- Geburtstagsüberraschungen,- jahres- und tageszeitliche Anpassungen, - Erstellung von bis zu fünf Profilen,- kindersicherer AppWecker zur Begrenzung der Nutzungszeit,- kindersicherer Erwachsenenbereich mit diversen Einstellungsmöglichkeiten. Der (medien-)pädagogische Hintergrund: Die KiKANiNCHEN-App möchte Vorschulkinder dort abholen, wo sie sich in ihrem individuellen Entwicklungsstand befinden. Sie werden entsprechend ihrer Bedürfnisse gefördert, ohne sie dabei zu überfordern. Der Schwerpunkt der App liegt auf diesen Bereichen:  - Förderung der Kreativität durch exploratives Ausprobieren, Forschen und Gestalten,  - Spiel und Spaß ohne Überforderung und Zeitdruck, - Vermittlung von Selbstbewusstsein für das eigene Handeln,- Förderung der Medienkompetenz,- Training von Aufmerksamkeit und Konzentrationsfähigkeit.Support: KiKA möchte die KiKANiNCHEN-App auf einem hohen inhaltlichen und technischen Niveau weiterentwickeln. Feedback - Lob, Kritik, Ideen, die Meldung von Problemen – helfen dabei.Das KiKA-Team antwortet gern auf Ihre Anmerkungen über kika@kika.de. Über die Kommentare in den Stores kann dieser Support nicht geleistet werden. Über KiKA:KiKA ist ein Gemeinschaftsprogramm der ARD-Landesrundfunkanstalten und des ZDF für junge Zuschauer von drei bis 13 Jahren.Unter der Dachmarke „KiKANiNCHEN“ bietet der Kinderkanal von ARD und ZDF wochentäglich die besten Vorschulsendungen von ARD, ZDF und KiKA. Für die Drei- bis Sechs-jährigen ist „KiKANiNCHEN“ „das“ Angebot. Hier sehen sie Programme, die auf ihre Fähigkeiten und ihre Bedürfnisse abgestimmt sind: anregende und witzige Geschichten und Lieder.www.kikaninchen.de www.kika.dewww.kika.de/erwachsene
descriptionHTML:
In der App können Kinder in die liebevoll gestaltete Schnipselwelt eintauchen. Gemeinsam mit Kikaninchen gehen sie auf spannende Erkundungstouren und gestalten Schnipseltiere im Bauernhof, erfinden abenteuerliche Fahrzeuge und probieren sie aus oder schauen ihre Lieblingssendungen aus dem KiKANiNCHEN Fernsehprogramm.

Die App versteht sich nicht als Spiel, sondern vielmehr als vielseitiges Spielzeug und Begleiter: spielerisches Entdecken und Ausprobieren, anregende und lustige Spiele ohne Zeitdruck, kreatives Gestalten und Musizieren stehen dabei im Vordergrund. Eine App, die mit dem Kind wächst und an der das Kind wachsen kann – ohne Werbung oder Inhalte, die Vorschulkindern Angst machen oder sie überfordern.

Die KiKANiNCHEN-App ist ein Angebot für App-Einsteiger, das sich an dem Entwicklungsstand und den Bedürfnissen der jungen Medienanfänger orientiert. In enger Zusammenarbeit mit Medienpädagogen wurde das Angebot entwickelt, um Kindern einen geschützten Raum zu bieten, in dem sie ihre ersten Erfahrungen im Umgang mit Apps sammeln können. Die textfreie und kinderleichte Steuerung der App ist ideal für Vorschulkinder im Alter ab drei Jahren.


Es gibt viel zu entdecken:

- 3 Spiele,
- 5 Mini-Spiele,
- zielgruppengerechte und wechselnde Videoangebote aus dem öffentlich-rechtlichen Fernsehangebot von ARD, ZDF und KiKA,
- liebevoll und abwechslungsreich gestaltete Welten: unter Wasser, im Weltall, im Wald, auf einer Schatzinsel, auf einem Piratenschiff etc.


Das bietet die App:

- multisensorische Steuerung über Touchen, Pusten, Klatschen, Schütteln und Singen,
- sie ist kostenlos, ohne In-App-Käufe oder sonstigen Werbeangebote,
- Download-Funktion von Videos zur Offline-Nutzung,
- Personalisierungsmöglichkeiten,
- Geburtstagsüberraschungen,
- jahres- und tageszeitliche Anpassungen,
- Erstellung von bis zu fünf Profilen,
- kindersicherer AppWecker zur Begrenzung der Nutzungszeit,
- kindersicherer Erwachsenenbereich mit diversen Einstellungsmöglichkeiten.


Der (medien-)pädagogische Hintergrund:

Die KiKANiNCHEN-App möchte Vorschulkinder dort abholen, wo sie sich in ihrem individuellen Entwicklungsstand befinden. Sie werden entsprechend ihrer Bedürfnisse gefördert, ohne sie dabei zu überfordern. Der Schwerpunkt der App liegt auf diesen Bereichen:

- Förderung der Kreativität durch exploratives Ausprobieren, Forschen und Gestalten,
- Spiel und Spaß ohne Überforderung und Zeitdruck,
- Vermittlung von Selbstbewusstsein für das eigene Handeln,
- Förderung der Medienkompetenz,
- Training von Aufmerksamkeit und Konzentrationsfähigkeit.


Support:

KiKA möchte die KiKANiNCHEN-App auf einem hohen inhaltlichen und technischen Niveau weiterentwickeln. Feedback - Lob, Kritik, Ideen, die Meldung von Problemen – helfen dabei.

Das KiKA-Team antwortet gern auf Ihre Anmerkungen über kika@kika.de. Über die Kommentare in den Stores kann dieser Support nicht geleistet werden.


Über KiKA:

KiKA ist ein Gemeinschaftsprogramm der ARD-Landesrundfunkanstalten und des ZDF für junge Zuschauer von drei bis 13 Jahren.

Unter der Dachmarke „KiKANiNCHEN“ bietet der Kinderkanal von ARD und ZDF
wochentäglich die besten Vorschulsendungen von ARD, ZDF und KiKA. Für die Drei- bis Sechs-jährigen ist „KiKANiNCHEN“ „das“ Angebot. Hier sehen sie Programme, die auf ihre Fähigkeiten und ihre Bedürfnisse abgestimmt sind: anregende und witzige Geschichten und Lieder.

www.kikaninchen.de
www.kika.de
www.kika.de/erwachsene
developer: KiKA Der Kinderkanal von ARD und ZDF
recentChanges: Dies ist die erste Version der KiKANiNCHEN-App. KiKA wünscht viel Freude beim Ausprobieren.
summary: In the app, children can immerse KiKANiNCHEN in the snippets world.
title: KiKANiNCHEN-App

comments: Removed ads but now during the game, collecting power ups doesn't actually give me a power up where as my rivals do and they all get ahead with their attacks. Needs to be seriously fixed.  Not fixed. Jus getting annoying now

My game crashed like 4 matches in. It just happened once to me, but online gaming that crashes in a game like this can be a real kill joy. Overall I think it's a great game and I enjoy playing. Obviously, we can all do without the crashes.

One of the few titles that gives me hope for the mobile gaming sector & perfectly suitable for minors as well! Between all the classics (for example Golden Axe) and this game, Sega made a great appearance in mobile gaming. If they keep launching highlights like this, they will soon be light-years ahead of other mobile game designers. Animations and graphics are extraordinary fluent and good (application is only about 360 megs big; I have seen gigabyte size applications with lower graphics quality). The controls and on-screen buttons work well with almost no delay. In the lower tiers there are not many different tracks available yet, but those I unlocked are well designed, taking a few minutes for a single run. Some obstacles are a bit hard to distinguish at first, and it would be helpful to have a database where you could look up track obstacles & traps (skills) with a picture and a short description. No matter if you play a single race for a few minutes or keep going a while the game is nicely motivating, and it seems as if there were other modes to come in the future as well. Races can turn almost within every second, some of the nasty traps, will make you curse other contesters now and then, but in most cases I did not have the feeling that there were many unfair pay2win advantages we all know only too well from many mobile games (allthough it is quite strange that winning against opponents with more trophies happens rarely and feels as if players with more trophies received more suitable items/protection to have an easier time and don't loose! Also some races feel "stranger" than others, especially when the google play service delays or disrupts connection/device performance during race set-up!!! Similiar google play service disruptions made me loose to possebility to double 1st rank rewards mysteriously often!!!). If you are looking for a cute & fast arcade style game and have those 360 megabytes of space available, I can highly recommend to give this one a try!!

comments: My favorite puzzle/physics app. After I reached my goal of 3 stars on all the levels, I was sad my conquest was over. Then I discovered a whole other area of the app that consists of user created levels to solve. Now I've got new puzzles everyday thanks to the active fans in the brain-it-on community and I submit my own levels on occasion by using the level editor. If you like solving puzzles this is a great way to escape for awhile and exercise your brain at the same time.

I introduced this game to my 8 year old and my husband. We are all hooked! I am fascinated by the concept and simple yet brilliant design. The forced 30 second ads that another reviewer mentioned are only if you want a hint. The between-round ads are short and intermittent.

this game is so simple but yet so challenging. some levels seem impossible but the great thing is you can still advance as long as you have enough points. very well done. hats off to the designer. the physics are coded perfect as well for gravity friction inertia and sometimes extra bounce..  love it. can only handle it in bursts of play because it works your brain so intensely. havent used the hints either though. if you dont keep coming back to play this then you probably arent a very interesting person and spend too much time diddling your privates

A good sign of high intelligence would be to not pay for this.   On a tablet with a pen,  this probably works a little better but on a phone with 1 minute ads,   it's really frustrating.   Basically,  you find a solution and have to repeat it 30 times until the dull and unrealistic physics of this program finally accept it.

Hmm, what to say? I enjoyed it thoroughly (and I still am enjoying it). It was far more challenging than I thought, and I enjoyed being challenged by it. After all, that's what the game's about, isn't it? It's definitely a great game overall, and I'm looking forward to seeing how much further I can get in it. Also, it's really fun to just throw a massive block at a puzzle when you're confused. Sometimes violence IS the answer, it seems.

LOVE this game!! Literally, I don't think I can explain it. Just play it, and see for yourself :D    If you like figuring stuff & puzzles out, this is totally for you! And also, it's just so satisfying to watch. I personally play lots of the puzzles over & over again, just to see the graphics, how all the objects fly and move 😜
description: Deceptively challenging physics puzzles for your brain!Draw shapes to solve challenging physics puzzles. They're not as easy as they look. Care to give one a try?◆ Dozens of brain busting physics puzzles, with more being added all the time◆ Compete with your friends for the Brain It On! crown◆ Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?◆ Share your unique solutions and compare with your friendsAll the levels can be unlocked for free by earning stars in previous levels. You can always find dozens of new player created free levels each day on the community screen. You can also purchase the game to remove all ads, unlock all hints, unlock levels early, and unlock the level editor.Please note: purchasing the "No Popup Ads" option just removes the ads between levels, purchasing the "Full Game" will also remove the ads to get hints.If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As an indie developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at support@brainitongame.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.You can find me on Twitter at @orbitalnine, see the latest news on the Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/brainitongame, or get all the details on the website: http://brainitongame.comI hope you enjoy Brain It On!
descriptionHTML:
Deceptively challenging physics puzzles for your brain!

Draw shapes to solve challenging physics puzzles. They're not as easy as they look. Care to give one a try?

◆ Dozens of brain busting physics puzzles, with more being added all the time
◆ Compete with your friends for the Brain It On! crown
◆ Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?
◆ Share your unique solutions and compare with your friends

All the levels can be unlocked for free by earning stars in previous levels. You can always find dozens of new player created free levels each day on the community screen. You can also purchase the game to remove all ads, unlock all hints, unlock levels early, and unlock the level editor.

Please note: purchasing the "No Popup Ads" option just removes the ads between levels, purchasing the "Full Game" will also remove the ads to get hints.

If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As an indie developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at support@brainitongame.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.

You can find me on Twitter at @orbitalnine, see the latest news on the Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/brainitongame, or get all the details on the website: http://brainitongame.com

I hope you enjoy Brain It On!

comments: The game is fun, but results take 2 and 3 days and if other people are on higher levels they have access to better tableware and vases, pictures etc, so their rooms stand out more and they have a better chance at getting 5 stars. And some items I've purchased don't work it gives a message saying they couldn't find it in the warehouse. But the game never gave me my gems back and of money. NEED TO FIX IT

Love it! Having played for several months now I would love to have a few more rooms to design.... Bathroom kitchen and attic are all possibilities. Also would like the voting to be a bit better... Some designs get high marks but aren't what was asked for which defeats the purpose really. Also can we have the option to pass on voting as there have been times that I've not liked either choice but have Had to pick one. Other than that it's a fab game.

Entertaining. It's easy to spend a lot of the free money and diamonds on design, then you may have to wait a while to advance if you want to play free. It's clear there is no switch up on the top players, so when you go into competition, it's all about how much money you have to spend. Even when the rooms have a theme, people tend to vote for their taste, vs. if the request stated i.e. Mid-century mod, or traditional. Addictive unfortunately.

I love this game!! "it helps a lot" with my shopping addiction because I feel like I'm buying real merchandise. I really enjoy the updates and how you guys added more room to be designed!!!! Also the 2d & 3d option to view products is awesome!! and if your  studying for interior design this is the app for you! I love the voting of others designs, you get to view everyone creativity. I really love how you guys never ask for an rating....like some apps by the 1st go you get popups please rate our app you guys never asked for an rating I choose to. Thanks for getting me addicted :))

I have been playing for a year now and I'm still in love with Design Home! True, it's hard not to spend extra money but I do believe that the makers have formed a game that can be enjoyable by those with money to spend to have fun but, also have developed a game with really beautiful items that one can buy very inexpensively, and even pieces that are in between. You can't get more thoughtful than that!

I really love this game. I love voting and seeing what other have also come up with. I love that it is really world design where you can actually shop for pieces and not cartoon rubbish. However, I have had a number of issues where the game has had to restart and have even lost diamonds and cash after trying to collecting daily rewards when it re starts, watching endless adds and not receiving rewards for them or downloading other useless games I have no interest in and actually playing them to generate rewards and not receiving them either. These are my only issues with the game. Other than these it would be five stars.
description: Love home decorating? Play Design Home today - a relaxing, fun game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Sharpen your decorating skills in daily Design Challenges and style visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to real, high-end furniture and decor brands. It’s quick, it’s fun and you can connect with a vibrant creative community while learning about diverse décor styles - thus improving your design skills and gaining inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.* Relax through play and express your creativity in daily Design Challenges.* Unlock rewards as you polish your amazing abilities as an interior decorator.* Play with real life, high-end brands as you learn about different interior design styles.* Vote on your favorite rooms from a vibrant, creative community.* Share your creativity and borrow furnishings from your friends when you connect to Facebook.Love the items in your favorite room? You can shop for them directly through Design Home! Click any piece you love and buy it for your own home. With new pieces added every day, Design Home literally puts the best home décor (alternative: furnishings) directly at your fingertips. Not only can you discover brands and trends, you can own them, too!

comments: I played this a while back and decided to come back and see if anything had changed and it sure did. There have been several updates that I love (the new maps, new sharks, equipment, etc.) and I'm glad I'm playing it now. In game currency price for items has been balanced out which I love and the missions system is much better now. I would highly recommend this game to anyone who likes progression-based time-killing games like Hungry Shark World.

This game is amazing! Everyone needs to play this. I would've given a fifth star however you need to not only buy all XXL sharks to unlock the "!!" Sharks but max them out. Definitely download this, just one tip. Don't delete when you have progress. I've downloaded, played, got bored, and deleted 3 times. Now I'm never deleting it. I have so much progress, if I never deleted it the first time I would have everything in the game

Finally! For the the longest time I've been waited, the gaming performance has been improved! No more annoying lag and the gameplay feel a lot smoother now and I am so happy about it. But the graphics still needs to be improved because it doesn't look too good and some minor bug needs to be fixed.

Favourite Shark game in the entire world. I became obsessed because it's so addictive and fun. The graphics are amazing, disappointed when I got my new phone I lost my progress even when I used the smart transfer to transfer the app. I've had to start all over again... but the fun continues!

Do not upgrade your Sharks.  The bigger the shark, the more difficult it is to play.  Big sharks have more drain on health and hunger, causing you to die more frequently. Impassable areas due to size of !! shark and less fishes to eat when health gets low.  Not to mention how slow these big sharks move!  The more you spend on bigger sharks, the less fun you'll have.

I've had to start this game all over from the very beginning 3 times. After working hard to get all the way to the top sharks, the app will suddenly refuse to connect to your Facebook account and want you to start a whole new game. Waste of time. Very frustrating. Not enjoyable at all. Find a game that's enjoyable. This one is definitely not fun.

descriptionHTML:
*** Hungry Shark World Selected in Google Play’s Best Games of 2016 collection ***
The Sharks are back in the bigger and badder sequel to Hungry Shark Evolution!
Control a shark in a feeding frenzy and eat your way through many oceans feasting on everything from bite-size fish and birds to tasty whales and unwitting humans!
***This game is only compatible with devices running on Android 4.2 or above***

MORE THAN 20 SHARK SPECIES
Choose from a range of sharks in 7 different size tiers, including the most iconic ocean predator: the Great White!

HUGE OPEN WORLDS
Explore the lush Pacific Islands, frozen Arctic Ocean, exotic Arabian Sea, and now the South China Sea, a vibrant urban destination full of fresh, unwary victims!

FEAST FOR YOUR EYES
Experience the feeding frenzy in stunning console quality 3D graphics that will blow everything else out of the water!

SURVIVAL OF THE HUNGRIEST
It’s eat or be eaten in waters packed with 100s of delicious and dangerous creatures… Whales, submarines and wandering locals BEWARE!

SMASHING SHARK SWAG
Level up your shark and equip jawsome gadgets to bite harder, swim faster and grow even hungrier! No shark is complete without headphones, umbrella and a freakin' jetpack!

MANIC MISSIONS & BADASS BOSSES
Take on more than 20 different types of mission including high score challenges, prey hunts and epic boss fights!

HELPFUL PREDATORY PETS
Baby sharks, whales, an octopus, and even a bald eagle are happy to help with special abilities to increase health, score and more!

SUPERSIZED MEAL DEAL
Unleash your shark's predator potential: SuperSize mode, rushes, explosion, hypnosis and more!

INTUITIVE TILT CONTROLS
Back by popular demand, now you can control your shark simply by tilting your phone!

Google Play Leaderboards and Achievements enabled.
Use Facebook to synchronise your progress across your GP devices.
Hungry Shark World is regularly updated with new features, content and challenges to keep you coming back for more!
This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gems and Gold currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Gold can also be collected in game without requiring purchases.
This game contains advertising. Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

description: Welcome to the all new 100 BallsOver 20 million players - #1 in U.K., Germany and 6 other countries!*Powered by Reach Mob - the leading app marketing engine*INTRODUCING - Battle ModeChallenge your friends in awesome multiplayer games!100 Balls is one of the most addictive mobile game on Google Play. Join 20 million+ fans today and start competing with your friends. What are you waiting for? Play this incredibly addicting game and test your reflexes.HOW TO PLAY 100 BALLS:● The goal of the game is to get the balls through the cup by tapping on the screen and releasing the balls. Each ball you get through the cup rewards you with a different amount of points, depending on the color of the cup. If the ball misses the cup, it disappears. When you lose all of your balls, the game is over.● If you manage to drop 20 balls through the cup without missing a single one, you will be rewarded with a score multiplier. Keep in mind that the multiplier is not limited and can earn you a lot of extra points. Losing a ball will reset the multiplier, so be careful and have fun!FEATURES:● Online Leaderboard● 15 Different Colored Balls● Realistic Physics● Single Tap Control● Endless Gameplay● Addicting game● Clean graphicsFollow us Twitter at https://twitter.com/EpiCoroGamesLike us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/EpiCoroGames

INTRODUCING - Battle Mode

100 Balls is one of the most addictive mobile game on Google Play. Join 20 million+ fans today and start competing with your friends. What are you waiting for? Play this incredibly addicting game and test your reflexes.

HOW TO PLAY 100 BALLS:
● The goal of the game is to get the balls through the cup by tapping on the screen and releasing the balls. Each ball you get through the cup rewards you with a different amount of points, depending on the color of the cup. If the ball misses the cup, it disappears. When you lose all of your balls, the game is over.

● If you manage to drop 20 balls through the cup without missing a single one, you will be rewarded with a score multiplier. Keep in mind that the multiplier is not limited and can earn you a lot of extra points. Losing a ball will reset the multiplier, so be careful and have fun!

FEATURES:
● Online Leaderboard
● 15 Different Colored Balls
● Realistic Physics
● Single Tap Control
● Endless Gameplay
● Addicting game
● Clean graphics

Follow us Twitter at https://twitter.com/EpiCoroGames
Like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/EpiCoroGames
summary: Tap on the right moment to release balls into cup. Try not to lose 100 balls.
title: 100 Balls - Tap to Drop the Color Ball Game

comments: I thought this was a fun game with a good objective.  The fact that you chase someone, throw bottles at them while chasing them, and kicking balls at them while chasing them is quite fun. With so many games out there that have weak game play, this game was breath of fresh air.  The graphics are okay, and the gameplay is easy to learn with good tutorial on how to play. The only thing that I would have them change is the music, it's kinda low even when you adjust the volume. Other then that, I recommend this game to any and everybody. The degree of difficulty is not too easy, or not too hard, but just right and I don't even write reviews but I felt compelled and was really impressed with this game

comments: Absolutely amazing game!!! I'm a huge petrol head and this ticks all boxes considering it's a phone game. Love the controls. Personally i use accelerator on right, brake on left and tilt to turn. Feels bang on. Graphics top notch. No need to spend money to progress. Literally one downfall... upgrade costs when you get higher spec cars. Apart from that... GOOD JOB!!!

It's a great game where you can race and customise your own car. However here are some ideas I would like you the imlament please  1. If the cars from the NASCAR can get the custmizeing like all the others.   2. To extend the custmize can yo add a tab where you can put spoilers, air intakes And other things you would put on a car.  3. Finally to make this game real racing 3 if when a race of just go to see all the car you have.  There be a "i" button that will give the player real information about the car the player is looking at.

Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

comments: A very fun and addictive game. I make bows all day, but it's nice to be able to shoot from my couch at night.  The influence of wind on the arrow is accurate when it comes to drift. A little costly on the upgrades for those that don't buy their way to the top, but all games are that way.

Starts off ok but completely rigged to deplete your coins and to get you to spend money. Bow repairs and inconsistent wind effects among a couple of tactics. Also payed to upgrade my bow and sights and it was gone next time I logged in.
Ok game, but bingo mode is a huge pain.  My shots filled out the opponent's card better than mine.  Stupid way to lose a lot of progress/coins.

I'm having issues with the speed/timed sessions.  Towards the end, the animation sequence will glitch, resulting in my opponent having time to get off an additional shot, while I'm attempting to reset and draw the bow.  Outside of that, it's an excellent game.

Game would be great if it didn't lag out after 6 games. I've lost more gold in rush due to the game's performance degrading than I can keep track of. Once it starts losing frame rate just quit or you will bleed gold.

Game was fine. Lately, keeps freezing and somehow opponents are getting 10's when I CLEARLY see them hitting nowhere near the middle. Matches are freezing while i'm ahead, then match ends and says I lost. Somehow i've lost 20 million coins, and not from legit losing either. I also just played a match for 1 million coins, i had over 1 million in the bank. I know sonehow have 0 after I clearly won the match but it said I lost. Either people are using cheats or the game is not functioning properly

comments: Lost another These constant updates caused me to uninstall this. Fun game - very good game!But if it ain't broke don't fix it. I will not sacrifice all the other good games I have for this single one. Now with google only allowing so many apps ( no writing to sd card). Atleast if you update you should let people keep playing with version they have. Make updates optional.

It's a fun game. If you're a COD player you'll love it. In general It does good on it's own as a solid shooter. Only thing I think you really, REALLY need to change is the way to get weapons. Using rentals is great, picking up enemy or ally weapons, sure, but having to spend money to get most weapons, if not all, seems a little unfair. It's good that there's a grind to get them but I think it's a little overkill how difficult it is. I think levels should determine what you unlock, then use silver (make it easier to get) to purchase it. Or, if players want to speed up the process, use gold.

I really like the game. Fun, exciting, and addictive. The only problem I have is that the rewards you get are not nearly enough as I think they should be. Exp gains are good, but cash gains are so bad and you will have to play for hours to accumulate cash and then you can buy HALF of a weapon, because they require a lot of cash to get one. You also can barely upgrade weapons without any gold and you can just forget about that unless you put some real world currency in this game, which is a real shame. As a player I know we would like to buy and upgrade our own weapons instead of having to "rent" which is an option in the game.

But My 4 friends have IOS devices & their Servers are showing different than us. I don't know why? We can't even connect by number also. Tried doing that!. Please let me know its fixture

This game takes P2W concept to a whole new level. its ridiculously hard to get weapons that cost gold, even the ones that cost credits. you guys really need to give F2P players something to compete with...  Above all the game is fun to play! but it just gets frustrating sometimes due to P2W model.

Awesome graphics, and for what you get on a phone, it really is an amazing game. The only complaint (if you can even call it that) I have is the controls can be a little tricky as sometimes when you're trying to swing left or right you can accidentally change your weapon instead of swing to either side. Aside from that, tremendous gameplay, multiple modes to play, amazing graphics, really just an awesome game. Make sure you have a really good internet connection.

descriptionHTML:
WORLD WAR HEROES
Fight soldiers from all over the world in the best World War II online shooter for Android!
This game will take you to World War II, where you’ll able to use military vehicles to conduct battles.

The game features 7 game modes:

✯ Hardcore Mode
Mode increase the damage and makes the game more realistic;

✯ Deathmatch
Free fight for all. You fight for yourself. Player with the highest score wins the round, 1-2 hits and you lost, just like in real life.

✯ Team Deathmatch
Two teams fight for domination. The team with the highest score at the end of the round wins.

✯ Bomb Mode
One team should bring and plant a bomb at the indicated point, the other team must prevent it!

✯ Team Squad
Two teams fight each other with no respawns. The team which has at least one member alive wins.

✯ Team battle on panzers
Two teams are fighting each other for superiority using heavy machinery. The team that has the most points at the end of the round wins.

✯ Custom Modes
Create a game with your own rules! Tell your friends game number in the statistics window when you create a room and play together!


Features:

✯ 7 legendary World War II battles!
✯ 4 types of battle vehicles from different countries: USA, Russia, Japan, and Germany!
✯ 5 game modes and a custom mode with your own rules!
✯ 57 unique weapon types: pistols, assault rifles, machine guns, shotguns and many more!

*Reminder: Join tournaments to win prize, raise your clan!


More features:
✯✯✯ Login to Get Daily Free Gifts ✯✯✯
Login to Get Daily Free Gifts, Login to get Free Daily Quests!
Login to get daily free items. Don’t also miss the bonus EXP and Credits time!
　
✯✯✯ 50+ Weapons, Customize yourself ✯✯✯
50 types of weapons: guns, pistols, tommy-guns, subguns, grenades, rockets and body armors!
Customize your weapon and get a unique test piece – change the color and get all options, from barrels and stocks to scopes.

✯✯✯ Upgrade gear system ✯✯✯
Upgrade your gear and become stronger!
Claim first place and give a headshot to the one who will dare to contest the air!

Regular updates and new elements are waiting for you. This year’s best graphics and perfectly matched sounds will make you spend your time playing WWH!

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope– you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

descriptionHTML:
Defend your house! Your swamp cottage is under attack by animals gone crazy. You have to defend it and survive the oncoming attacks from the evil zombie critters who know no mercy.

What's great is that Swamp Attack is free to play, with the option to purchase items to help you progress through the levels faster.

Now with an ACTION-PACKED MULTIPLAYER MODE, more than 300 different single-player levels, 8 episodes and Quick Missions for instant action! Defend your house with more than 30 awesome defense tools like the mighty shotgun, the reckless minigun and the super atom bomb! Witness more than 35 different critters going wild - each with its own special attack!

HOW TO PLAY
- Tap the screen to shoot.
- Drag and drop the explosives onto monsters.
- Switch between weapons during the action.
- Upgrade and equip weapons before starting a new level.
- Drink potion to continue playing if you get killed, or to refill the energy instantly.

Defend your house and have fun!

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and contextual advertising
- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps
- The option to make in-app purchases
- The option to invite Facebook friends for in-game rewards
- The option to play against other users

comments: This is my favorite game on my phone. I only got it for something else on a different game, but it turned out that I loved it. It is a really fun game and the controls and stuff are easy. The only thing I don't like is that when you shoot sometimes in attacker defender, the other person jumps up and blocks the ball when it's already almost to the net. Please fix this. Overall though, it is a great game.

The new update attempts to force you to buy gold bricks I'm order to unlock your gift bags. This may force me to delete the game as it's annoying when your winning multiple games . They could at least adjust the price of the gold bricks. Use to be one of my favorite games and I am not one to play to many games .

Good game. Balanced controls. Thanks to the developers 😀. However the game shows constant network connectivity issues. Even though I use a very high speed wifi and data it still kicks me out for bad connection which leads to losing the game. Pls Fix this guy's. Apart from that an awesome game. Thumps up to the developers

The game play and concept are awesome but the only thing I dislike is getting paired up with someone who's lvl 90 (I'm only lvl 23). This means I'm matched up with someone with superior skills, balls and agility than I am..... which pretty much means I know I'm gonna lose. I don't mind losing but it kinda sucks when the favor is tilted in the other players favor straight away. I just did a $100.000 game and guess what? My opponent was lvl 90......

I shoot it perfect and it counts it as 2 points all the time, and when I'm playing for a million dollars my opponent gets two blue balls on fire and I dont even get one!! Makes this game not fun at all, and what happened to multiplayer with your friends? I deleted this game because it simply isn't fair and seems pretty rigged, hope you guys update some of these problems.

I think it's a good game and it had an awesome foundation up until the latest update. I am completely and utterly dissatisfied with the newest update. What happened, Mini Clip =(  Now it just feels like I'm waiting to play instead of playing. I'm alright with change just not coping Clash of Clans terrible waiting system, for prizes I won...

comments: I love this game. Its very addicting and fun, but I find that there are barely any female dragons. This upsets me very much and I would like for this to change. The only females I see are the dragons with names like  motherly dragon, belle dragon, viktoria dragons, and sleeping beauty dragons. There are also descriptions like "add some girly pink to your collections with the gummy dragon"(which is also coincidently a girl). Then I see cool legendary dragons, but OH plot twist they're all boys. This is a very fun game no doubt on that, but please, stop with the sexism and make cool female dragons. Thank you.

Just a few gripes. 1st of all I LOVE DRAGON CITY. Been playing for years. About your survey, I would never. You ask for too many permissions. Tree of life....when I get a Dragon here comes the same Dragon adding up for hatching. Like why? 815+ dragons are more than enough. Why do u keep adding, adding, adding. We could NEVER get all of them as it is. Why more? Love me some Dragon City like a said in the beginning.

This is #8 for Top Grossing Simulation and you can see in the game that they are trying everything they can to take the #1 spot.  During events they have a unique currency, if you spend real money on that currency and don't use it you're SOL. They don't compensate you by turning it into the next events currency.  Breeding and Hatching eggs takes enormous amounts of time be cause they want you to spend money to speed it up. (The rare the dragon the more tine it takes to breed and hatch, like 10-45hrs from what I've had).  Lastly only get 2 of 5 island, you have to SLOWLY save up crystal or pay real money to unlock them, islands fill up quick. You can youse the free gold but you better have a lot of Facebook friends playing as well or you can't unlock them

I feel that this is a fun and addictive game with lots of potential.. p However , please make quest battles in the arena longer , I was at the last battle but couldn't play it , because it's time was too short . 2 days is not alot, even if I play like 3 times or more a day.

It's a really good game, but just one problem:  there's that island that uses grid coins, and everytime Deus says " this island has a special currency:Grid coins" , it kicks me out of the game. Only when I go into that island and press 'ok' , it kicks me out. Please, Please, PLEASE fix it! I love playing dragon city and monster legends. :(

Like the game, but it keeps locking up an I lose my battles that I have won.  Also, some races and challenges are way too tight time wise.  It's a game, but when you make it impossible to get anywhere and we don't get credit for what we do it isn't any fun.

descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!

description: Mensch is a board game developed in Germany by Josef Friedrich Schmidt in 1907 or 1908.The game was issued in 1914 and sold about 70 million copies, driven by huge popularity among German troops serving in World War I It is a cross and circle game with the circle collapsed onto the cross, similar to the Indian game Pachisi, the Colombian game Parqués, the American games Parcheesi, Aggravation, and Trouble, and the English game Ludo.
descriptionHTML:
Mensch is a board game developed in Germany by Josef Friedrich Schmidt in 1907 or 1908.

The game was issued in 1914 and sold about 70 million copies, driven by huge popularity among German troops serving in World War I It is a cross and circle game with the circle collapsed onto the cross, similar to the Indian game Pachisi, the Colombian game Parqués, the American games Parcheesi, Aggravation, and Trouble, and the English game Ludo.
summary: Ludo is a board game developed in Germany by Josef Friedrich Schmidt in 1907
title: Ludo

comments: Constantly get matched up with people that are level 50+ as a level 10. The game is obviously nothing but pay to win and luck. It doesn't even try to mask the pay to win aspect of it. The rewards for winning are laughable compared to what you need to actually progress and the spin wheel lands on the worst possible prize every single time. Gee, thanks for the 50 coins every 24 hours!

Worst connection of any game I've ever played. When you're a new player with maybe 100 to 200 games you are sometimes matched with people with 12000 games. What's the point? I guess the experienced players play against the beginners to master their play. Seems like you would be in a pool of players with similar skills  or number of games or rank. Even if I'm close to winning a game, the connection sucks then it starts over.

Very addictive. But they require you to play like two thousand games for buying a better team with coins. Only few chances of getting a good team by luck. In other words, if you don't buy team with money, you're supposed to lose matches from those who have bought.

Fun game. I wish the rate of death was more consistent. 37,000,000 a day at one point, but waiting 6 months for 100,000 to die towards the end. The disease didn't change, the rate of death shouldn't decrease just because there are fewer people. Good game otherwise

What makes this game different is that instead of trying to save the human race, you try to destroy it.   Just a good job it isn't real.

description: Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself. Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive! ◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro! (more coming soon) P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references! Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!◈◈◈Like Plague Inc. on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc Follow me on Twitter: www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations
descriptionHTML:
Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.

Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself.

Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive!

◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈

Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro!

The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!

▶ “The game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics” – The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
▶ “Best Tablet Game of 2012” - New York Daily News
▶ “Plague Inc. will snag your attention in all the right ways and keep it there” - Touch Arcade
▶ “No denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of quality” - Modojo
▶ “Plague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is” – London Metro
▶ “Will leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of a bit of fun” – Pocket Lint
▶ “Plague Inc.'s gameplay is infectious” - Slide to Play
▶ Winner – “Overall Game of the Year” – Pocket Gamer
▶ “Killing billions has never been so fun” – IGN

◈◈◈

Features:
● Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed)
● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management)
● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful)
● 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?)
● Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!)
● 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved)
● Full game support for scoreboards and achievements
● Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!

Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon)

P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references!

Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!

◈◈◈

Like Plague Inc. on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc

Follow me on Twitter:
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations
